zh_xc: 好事、好消息不來報喜，壞事、壞消息卻一直來糾纏。比喻壞事連連。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Good things, good news don't come to bring joy, but bad things, bad news keep coming to entangle. It's a metaphor for constant misfortunes.

nan_sentence: 伊愛閣月外日才會轉來。
nan_tailo: I ài koh gue̍h-guā-ji̍t tsiah ē tńg--lâi.
zh_xc: 他還要一個多月才會回來。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He won't be back for more than a month.

nan_sentence: 逐个人若攏忍一下，就天下太平矣。
nan_tailo: Ta̍k ê lâng nā lóng lún--tsi̍t-ē, tō thian-hā thài-pîng--ah.
zh_xc: 若是每個人都能稍微忍耐一下，就會天下太平了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If everyone could be a little more patient, there would be peace throughout the world.

nan_sentence: 伊佮阿仁原本感情誠好，近來煞為著生理的代誌反目。
nan_tailo: I kah a jîn guân-pún kám-tsîng tsiânn hó, kīn-lâi suah uī tio̍h sing-lí ê tāi-tsì huán-bo̍k.
zh_xc: 他和阿仁本來感情很好，最近卻為了生意的事情不合。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He and Ah Ren originally had a very good relationship, but recently they have been at odds over business matters.

nan_sentence: 你有欠用就來共我講，我會當借你。
nan_tailo: Lí ū khiàm-īng tō lâi kā guá kóng, guá ē-tàng tsioh--lí.
zh_xc: 你缺錢用就來告訴我，我可以借你。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you are short of money, just tell me, I can lend you some.

nan_sentence: 遮的物件你若有欠用就提去。
nan_tailo: Tsia ê mi̍h-kiānn lí nā ū khiàm-īng tō the̍h--khì.
zh_xc: 這些東西你如果有需要就拿去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Take these things if you need them.

nan_sentence: 伊真凍霜，連一屑仔物都毋甘予人。
nan_tailo: I tsin tàng-sng, liân tsi̍t-sut-á mi̍h to m̄-kam hōo--lâng.
zh_xc: 他真小氣，連一點東西都捨不得給人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is so stingy, he can't even bear to give a little thing to others.
I will be very sad.
If you don't mind.

nan_sentence: 伊目睭反白睚，若像欲昏去矣。
nan_tailo: I ba̍k-tsiu píng-pe̍h-kâinn, ná tshiūnn beh hūn--khì-ah.
zh_xc: 他眼睛翻白眼，就像要昏過去了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His eyes rolled back, as if he was about to faint.

nan_tailo: Bô the̍h-tio̍h kuan-kun tsin m̄ kam-guān.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I really can't stand not winning the championship.

nan_sentence: 天光矣，你好起來讀冊矣！
zh_xc: 天亮了，你該起來上學了！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's dawn, you should get up for school!

nan_sentence: 我囥佇桌頂的文件是啥人提去？
nan_tailo: Guá khǹg tī toh-tíng ê bûn-kiānn sī siánn-lâng the̍h--khì?
zh_xc: 我放在桌上的文件是誰拿走了？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Who took the document that I put on the table?

nan_sentence: 你對這个方向直直行就到矣。
nan_tailo: Lí tuì tsit ê hong-hiòng ti̍t-ti̍t kiânn tō kàu--ah.
zh_xc: 你往這個方向直走就到了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You will get there if you go straight in this direction.

nan_sentence: 你工課著愛好好仔做，毋通學人做歹囝。
nan_tailo: Lí khang-khuè tio̍h-ài hó-hó-á tsò, m̄-thang o̍h lâng tsò pháinn-kiánn.
zh_xc: 你工作要好好地做，不可以學人家當不良少年。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You need to do your job well, you can't imitate others to become a delinquent teenager.

zh_xc: 天地顛倒，引申為違反常理。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The world is upside down, which is extended to mean against common sense.

nan_sentence: 天地遐爾仔大，免驚無所在通去。
nan_tailo: Thinn-tē hiah-ni-á-tuā, bián-kiann bô sóo-tsāi thang khì.
zh_xc: 世界這麼大，不用怕沒地方去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The world is so big, there's no need to fear having nowhere to go.

nan_sentence: 少年若無一擺戇，路邊哪有有應公。
nan_tailo: Siàu-liân nā bô tsi̍t pái gōng, lōo-pinn ná ū Iú-ìng-kong.
zh_xc: 若不是因為年少輕狂的痴傻舉動，荒野路邊哪兒來那些祭拜無主冤魂的小廟呢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If it weren't for the foolish actions of youthful recklessness, where would those small temples worshiping the unclaimed souls by the roadside in the wilderness come from?

nan_tailo: Tsit ê thâu-ke iáu tsin siàu-liân.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This boss is still very young.

nan_sentence: 我無佮意伊做代誌的方式。
nan_tailo: Guá bô kah-ì i tsò tāi-tsì ê hong-sik.
zh_xc: 我不喜歡他做事情的方法。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I don't like the way he does things.

nan_sentence: 伊身體欠安，才會無來上班。
nan_tailo: I sin-thé khiàm-an, tsiah-ē bô lâi siōng-pan.
zh_xc: 他因為身體不舒服，所以沒有到班。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He didn't go to work because he was not feeling well.

nan_sentence: 烏白罵人是毋好的代誌。
nan_tailo: Oo-pe̍h mē--lâng sī m̄ hó ê tāi-tsì.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Swearing at people is not a good thing.
This matter cannot be spoken about.

zh_xc: 在不好的年頭，狂人奇事特別多。比喻怪事年年有，今年特別多。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In a bad year, there are particularly many madmen and strange events. It's a metaphor that strange things happen every year, but they are particularly numerous this year.

nan_sentence: 恁遮的少年家毋通傷衝碰，逐項代誌攏愛想予伊較斟酌咧。
nan_tailo: Lín tsia-ê siàu-liân-ke m̄-thang siunn tshóng-pōng, ta̍k hāng tāi-tsì lóng ài siūnn hōo i khah tsim-tsiok--leh.
zh_xc: 你們這些年輕小伙子不要太衝動莽撞，凡事都要仔細小心地想清楚。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You young lads shouldn't be too impulsive and reckless, think carefully about everything.

nan_sentence: 若是一个毋好勢，代誌就去了了矣。
nan_tailo: Nā-sī tsi̍t ê m̄ hó-sè, tāi-tsì tō khì-liáu-liáu--ah.
zh_xc: 若是一個不湊巧，事情就全完了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If it wasn't for a coincidence, everything would have been over.

zh_xc: 胳臂只會向內彎，不會向外彎。比喻偏袒自己人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The arm can only bend inward, not outward. This is a metaphor for favoring one's own people.
That person is very bad.

nan_tailo: I sí ê sî-tsūn tsin pháinn-sí.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He suffered greatly when he died.

nan_tailo: Tse m̄-tsiânn tsînn, lí tō siu--khí-lâi.
zh_xc: 這算不上什麼錢，你得收下。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This is not much money, you have to take it.

nan_sentence: 伊去予彼个毋成人氣甲欲死。
nan_tailo: I khì hōo hit ê m̄-tsiânn-lâng khì kah beh sí.
zh_xc: 他被那個不肖之徒氣個半死。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He was infuriated to death by that unworthy person.

nan_sentence: 你欲騎跤踏車，手扞仔著愛扞予伊好。
nan_tailo: Lí beh khiâ kha-ta̍h-tshia, tshiú-huānn-á tio̍h-ài huānn hōo i hó.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you want to ride a bicycle, you have to hold the handlebars well.

nan_sentence: 伊是好額人，遮的零星錢對伊來講是毋成物。
nan_tailo: I sī hó-gia̍h-lâng, tsia-ê lân-san-tsînn tuì i lâi kóng sī m̄-tsiânn-mi̍h.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is a wealthy man, these small changes are insignificant to him.

nan_tailo: M̄-tsiânn-kâu, koh ē khó tē-it miâ.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: That's impressive, even got first place in the exam.

nan_sentence: 少年袂曉想，食老毋成樣。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When you're young, you don't think about it. When you're old, it doesn't look good.

nan_sentence: 這馬外口的天色已經暗矣。
nan_tailo: Tsit-má guā-kháu ê thinn-sik í-king àm--ah.
zh_xc: 現在外面天色已經暗了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The sky outside is already dark now.

nan_sentence: 天色已經無早，我欲轉去矣！
nan_tailo: Thinn-sik í-king bô tsá, guá beh tńg--khì--ah!
zh_xc: 時間已經不早，我要回去了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's getting late, I have to go back.

nan_sentence: 伊就是歹心行，才會受著報應。
nan_tailo: I tō-sī pháinn-sim-hīng, tsiah-ē siū-tio̍h pò-ìng.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has a bad heart, that's why he got his comeuppance.

nan_sentence: 醫生講伊欠血，著愛加食一寡較營養的物件。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The doctor said he is anemic and needs to eat more nutritious food.

nan_sentence: 我看伊做的歹代誌毋但按呢爾爾。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I see that the bad things he did are not just this.

nan_sentence: 伊毋但寄付錢，閣去做義工。
nan_tailo: I m̄-nā kià-hù tsînn, koh khì tsò gī-kang.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He not only donated money, but also volunteered.

nan_sentence: 代誌做好矣，你毋免來矣。

nan_sentence: 厝是阿公的手尾放落來的。

nan_sentence: 伊月尾欲去高雄看𪜶後生。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is going to Kaohsiung to see his son at the end of the month.

nan_sentence: 我手尾力無夠，捾袂起來。
nan_tailo: Guá tshiú-bué-la̍t bô-kàu, kuānn bē khí--lâi.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: My grip strength is not enough, I can't lift it up.

nan_sentence: 遐的查埔囡仔手真賤，愛掣查某囡仔的毛尾仔。
nan_tailo: Hia ê tsa-poo gín-á tshiú tsin tsiān, ài tshuah tsa-bóo gín-á ê mn̂g-bué-á.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Those boys are naughty, they like to pull girls' braids.

nan_sentence: 這个客戶真歹扭搦，我看你閣揣一个人佮你去好矣。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê kheh-hōo tsin pháinn-liú-la̍k, guá khuànn lí koh tshuē tsi̍t ê lâng kah lí khì hó--ah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This client is difficult to deal with, I think it's better for you to find someone else to go with you.

nan_sentence: 伊有家己的想法，毋過毋敢開喙反抗𪜶阿爸的決定。
nan_tailo: I ū ka-kī ê siūnn-huat, m̄-koh m̄ kánn khui-tshuì huán-khòng in a-pah ê kuat-tīng.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has his own thoughts, but dares not speak out against his father's decision.

nan_sentence: 阮兜魚櫥仔的魚仔攏反肚矣。
nan_tailo: Guán tau hî-tû-á ê hî-á lóng píng-tōo--ah.
zh_xc: 我家魚缸裡的魚都死了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: All the fish in my fish tank have died.

nan_sentence: 彼个人的心肝真䆀，不時都想欲害人。
nan_tailo: Hit ê lâng ê sim-kuann tsin bái, put-sî to siūnn-beh hāi--lâng.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: That person is really heartless, always wanting to harm others.

nan_sentence: 逐个囡仔攏是爸母的心肝仔寶貝。

nan_tailo: Tsit pái ê tsuí-tsai tsin giâm-tiōng.

nan_sentence: 你這馬當咧心狂火著，千萬毋通做決定。
nan_tailo: Lí tsit-má tng-teh sim-kông-hué-to̍h, tshian-bān m̄-thang tsò kuat-tīng.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You are extremely angry right now, absolutely do not make decisions.
My sweetheart.
My chest is hurting.
This child is hard to raise.

nan_sentence: 今仔日佇高速公路發生一件反車的意外。
nan_tailo: Kin-á-ji̍t tī ko-sok kong-lōo huat-sing tsi̍t kiānn píng-tshia ê ì-guā.

nan_tailo: I sī tsi̍t ê bô-thian-liông ê lâng.

nan_sentence: 這款工課恁文身的根本都做袂來。

nan_sentence: 宜蘭、鹿港的方言真有特色。

nan_sentence: 你若毋較拍拚咧，連鞭就無法度佮人比並。

nan_sentence: 人若予人比並做精牲就足毋值矣！

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's really demeaning if a person is compared to a beast!

nan_sentence: 我規暝反來反去睏袂去。

nan_sentence: 伊講話按呢反來反去，毋知伊到底是欲按怎。

nan_sentence: 阿英仔誠歹命，自細漢爸母就過身矣。

nan_sentence: 毛呼龜粿粽，紅包隨你送。

nan_tailo: Ū-iân tsiah ē-tàng tsò hu-tshe, lín tō mài koh uan--ah--lah!

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Only those who are destined can become husband and wife, so you two should stop arguing!

nan_sentence: 伊真歹性地，磕袂著就欲共人罵。

nan_sentence: 你著愛紮雨傘去，毋拄好落雨就用會著。

nan_sentence: 比武招親是歌仔戲才有的齣頭。

nan_tailo: Thiann kóng hit-king tshù ū pháinn-mi̍h.

nan_tailo: Guá kha-té senn tsi̍t lia̍p tsuí-phā.

nan_sentence: 這塊桌仔著愛踅頭，讀冊才食會著光。

zh_xc: 這塊桌子得要掉個頭，讀書才照得到光線。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This table needs to be turned around so that you can get the light when you're reading.

nan_sentence: 這个十字路口車袂使踅頭。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê si̍p-jī-lōo-kháu tshia bē-sái se̍h-thâu.
zh_xc: 這個十字路口不准車輛迴轉。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Vehicles are not allowed to turn around at this intersection.

zh_xc: 沒有蹤跡，常用來比喻虛假不實
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: No trace, often used to metaphorically describe falsehood or unreality.

nan_sentence: 叫伊來鬥顧擔，煞走甲無看見影跡。
nan_tailo: Kiò i lâi tàu kòo-tànn, suah tsáu kah bô khuànn-kìnn iánn-tsiah.
zh_xc: 叫他來幫忙顧攤子，卻跑得不見人影。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Asked him to help watch the stall, but he ran off without a trace.

nan_sentence: 伊講當選了後，欲整頓市場，結果攏無影跡。
nan_tailo: I kóng tòng-suán liáu-āu, beh tsíng-tùn tshī-tiûnn, kiat-kó lóng bô iánn-tsiah.
zh_xc: 他說當選之後，要整頓市場，結果都是虛假。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He said that after being elected, he would rectify the market, but it all turned out to be false.

nan_sentence: 這个撐渡伯仔真𠢕和人客唱褒歌。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê the-tōo peh--á tsin gâu hām lâng-kheh tshiùnn po-kua.
zh_xc: 這個擺渡老伯很擅長跟客人對唱褒歌。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This ferryman is very good at singing praises with his passengers.

nan_sentence: 你毋轉去食暗，是欲閣去佗位樂跎？
nan_tailo: Lí m̄ tńg-khì tsia̍h-àm, sī beh koh khì tó-uī lo̍k-tô?
zh_xc: 你不回去吃晚餐，又是要去哪兒逍遙？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You're not going back for dinner, where are you going to wander off to again?

nan_sentence: 樓栱去予蛀蟲蛀幾若穿。
nan_tailo: Lâu-kông khì hōo tsiù-thâng tsiù kuí-nā tshng.
zh_xc: 樓房的橫梁被蛀蟲蛀了好幾個洞。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The crossbeam of the building has been bored with several holes by termites.

nan_sentence: 樓栱會使囥一寡仔物件。
zh_xc: 天花板與屋頂之間的空間可以儲藏一些東西。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The space between the ceiling and the roof can be used to store some things.

nan_sentence: 箭竹仔筍炒肉絲，好食甲。
zh_xc: 箭竹筍炒肉絲，好吃得很。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Stir-fried pork with bamboo shoots, it's very delicious.

nan_sentence: 共遮的蝦笱下蹛溪裡，掠看有蝦仔無。
nan_tailo: Kā tsia ê hê-kô hē tuà khe--lí, lia̍h khuànn ū hê-á--bô.
zh_xc: 把這些蝦筌放在溪裡，看能不能抓到蝦子。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Put these shrimp traps in the stream and see if we can catch any shrimp.
Temporarily unemployed, don't be discouraged.
Noodle stall

nan_tailo: I tī lōo-pinn teh pâi tànn-á.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He sets up a stall on the side of the road.

nan_sentence: 伊替人擔罪，才會去坐監。
nan_tailo: I thè lâng tann-tsuē, tsiah ē khì tsē-kann.
zh_xc: 他替人頂罪，才會去坐牢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He went to jail because he took the blame for someone else.

nan_tailo: Tsia̍h hiông, khùn tiōng, tsoh-sit niau-niau-siòng.
zh_xc: 吃得兇，睡得多，要工作就東張西望，比喻好吃懶做。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Eats a lot, sleeps a lot, and when it's time to work, looks around aimlessly. This is a metaphor for being gluttonous and lazy.

nan_sentence: 現代時行佇結婚的隔轉日頭轉客， 順紲請人客。
nan_tailo: Hiān-tāi sî-kiânn tī kiat-hun ê keh-tńg-ji̍t thâu-tńg-kheh, sūn-suà tshiánn-lâng-kheh.
zh_xc: 現代流行在結婚的隔天歸寧， 順便宴請客人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It is a modern trend to return to one's hometown the day after the wedding, and to hold a banquet for guests at the same time.

nan_sentence: 外口嚇嚇叫是咧創啥物？
nan_tailo: Guā-kháu heh-heh-kiò sī teh tshòng siánn-mih?
zh_xc: 外頭鬧轟轟的是在幹什麼？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: What's all the noise outside about?

nan_sentence: 戲台小人生，人生大戲台。
nan_tailo: Hì-tâi sió jîn-sing, jîn-sing tuā hì-tâi.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Life is like a play, play is like life.

nan_sentence: 總講一句，是你家己做得來的，毋免去怪別人。
nan_tailo: Tsóng-kóng--tsi̍t-kù, sī lí ka-kī tsò-tit-lâi--ê, m̄-bián khì kuài pa̍t-lâng.
zh_xc: 總歸一句，是你自己造成的後果，不用去怪別人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In a nutshell, it's the consequences of your own actions, so don't blame others.

nan_sentence: 便若神明生，神轎攏會繞境驅煞。
nan_tailo: Piān-nā sîn-bîng senn, sîn-kiō lóng ē jiàu-kíng khu suah.
zh_xc: 每逢神明聖誕，神轎都會繞境驅煞。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Every time there is a god's birthday, the divine palanquin would go around the territory to exorcize evil spirits.

nan_sentence: 遮的物件舊漚舊臭，閣毋甘擲㧒捔。
nan_tailo: Tsia-ê mi̍h-kiānn kū-àu-kū-tshàu, koh m̄-kam tàn-hiat-ka̍k.
zh_xc: 這些東西老舊破爛，還捨不得丟棄。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: These things are old and tattered, yet I still can't bear to throw them away.

nan_sentence: 會曉煮雜菜麵的麵擔仔愈來愈少矣。
nan_tailo: Ē-hiáu tsú tsa̍p-tshài-mī ê  mī-tànn-á jú lâi jú tsió--ah.
zh_xc: 懂得煮什錦麵的麵攤越來越少了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The number of noodle stalls that know how to cook mixed noodles is decreasing.

nan_sentence: 伊是一个雜菜麵的跤數。
nan_tailo: I sī tsi̍t ê tsa̍p-tshài-mī ê kha-siàu.
zh_xc: 他是一個好像樣樣懂卻沒有一項專精的傢伙。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is a guy who seems to know a bit about everything, but doesn't specialize in anything.

nan_sentence: 今囡仔離跤手矣，你會使去四界遊矣。
nan_tailo: Tann gín-á lī-kha-tshiú--ah, lí ē-sái khì sì-kè iû--ah.
zh_xc: 現在孩子不需要全心照顧，你可以到處去玩了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Now that the child doesn't need full-time care, you can go out and have fun.

nan_sentence: 懶性的人做代誌無要無緊，定定會誤著代誌。
nan_tailo: Nuā-sìng ê lâng tsò-tāi-tsì bô-iàu-bô-kín, tiānn-tiānn ē gōo tio̍h tāi-tsì.
zh_xc: 懶散的人做事拖拖拉拉，常常會因為他的延誤，拖垮後面所有的活動。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Lazy people often drag their feet when doing things, and their delays often ruin all the activities that follow.
This park is very spacious.

nan_sentence: 空喙著用藥水布包咧，才袂發癀。
nan_tailo: Khang-tshuì tio̍h-īng io̍h-tsuí-pòo pau--leh, tsiah bē huat-hông.
zh_xc: 傷口要用紗布包著，才不致於發炎。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The wound needs to be covered with gauze to prevent inflammation.
Don't put things in the wrong place.

zh_xc: 天地上下顛倒，不合常理。意指人倫顛倒，長幼無序，或尊卑不分等等。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The world is turned upside down, it is against common sense. It refers to the reversal of human relationships, the disorder of the old and the young, or the indistinguishability of the superior and the inferior, and so on.
This disease is really troublesome.

nan_sentence: 鰇魚鬚就是鰇魚的跤佮手。
nan_tailo: Jiû-hî-tshiu tō sī jiû-hî ê kha kah tshiú.
zh_xc: 魷魚的觸手就是魷魚的手跟腳。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The tentacles of the squid are the hands and feet of the squid.
The seawater itself is salt water.

nan_sentence: 鹹水魚若是現流仔加足貴的。
nan_tailo: Kiâm-tsuí-hî nā-sī hiān-lâu-á ke tsiok kuì--ê.
zh_xc: 海魚若是現捕的貴得多。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Sea fish is much more expensive if it is caught fresh.

nan_sentence: 有當時仔食一屑仔鹹梅，會幫助消化。
nan_tailo: Ū-tang-sî-á tsia̍h tsi̍t-sut-á kiâm-muê, ē pang-tsōo siau-huà.
zh_xc: 偶爾吃一點點話梅，可以幫助消化。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Occasionally eating a little plum can help digestion.

nan_sentence: 有的人誠厚譴損，做啥物代誌攏著閣看日。
nan_tailo: Ū-ê lâng tsiânn kāu-khiàn-sńg, tsò siánn-mih tāi-tsì lóng tio̍h koh khuànn-ji̍t.
zh_xc: 有的人有很多禁忌，無論做什麼事情都還得擇日。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Some people have many taboos, and no matter what they do, they have to choose the right day.

zh_xc: 迷信禁忌以巫術做蠱來趨吉避凶。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Superstition taboo uses witchcraft to make gu to seek good fortune and avoid disaster.

nan_sentence: 醫生共聽筒囥佇我的胸坎，聽看我的肺部有各樣無。
nan_tailo: I-sing kā thiann-tâng khǹg tī guá ê hing-khám, thiann khuànn guá ê hì-pōo ū koh-iūnn--bô.
zh_xc: 醫師把聽診器放在我的胸膛，聽聽看我的肺部有沒有異狀。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The doctor placed the stethoscope on my chest to listen to see if there was anything unusual with my lungs.

nan_tailo: Lí tsò he sī teh liáu gōng-kang.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: What you are doing is in vain.

nan_sentence: 竹仔愛略仔烘一下，才有法度鬱拗。
nan_tailo: Tik-á ài lio̍h-á hang--tsi̍t-ē, tsiah ū huat-tōo ut-áu.
zh_xc: 竹子要稍微用火燒烤一下，才有辦法揉彎。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Bamboo needs to be slightly roasted over fire before it can be bent.
He is determined to frame me.

nan_sentence: 六月天火燒埔，規日攏誠鬱熱。
nan_tailo: La̍k-gue̍h-thinn hué-sio-poo, kui-ji̍t lóng tsiânn ut-jua̍h.
zh_xc: 農曆六月的天氣就像火燒山，整天都很悶熱。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The weather in June of the lunar calendar is like a burning mountain, it's hot all day.

nan_sentence: 最近咧落𤺪雨，衫仔褲披較久都袂焦。
nan_tailo: Tsuè-kīn teh lo̍h siān-hōo, sann-á-khòo phi khah kú to bē ta.
zh_xc: 最近霪雨不停，衣褲晾再久也不乾。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Recently, the rain has been non-stop, and no matter how long I hang my clothes and pants, they just won't dry.
Remember to pour wine during worship.

nan_tailo: Lāu lâng kiann pua̍h-tó, m̄-hó peh suann-kiā.
zh_xc: 老人家怕跌倒，不能爬山坡。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The elderly are afraid of falling and cannot climb the slope.

nan_tailo: I ê tshia-mn̂g hōo lâng lòng tsi̍t mau.
zh_xc: 他的車門被撞了個凹陷。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His car door was dented in a collision.

nan_sentence: 一人才分一疕仔，連楔喙齒縫都無夠。
nan_tailo: Tsi̍t lâng tsiah pun tsi̍t-phí-á, liân seh tshuì-khí-phāng to bô-kàu.
zh_xc: 一人才分得一點點，連塞牙縫都不夠。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: One person only gets a little bit, not even enough to fill the gaps between teeth.

nan_sentence: 你莫看伊人一疕仔囝，伊力頭真飽喔！
nan_tailo: Lí mài khuànn i lâng tsi̍t-phí-á kiánn, i la̍t-thâu tsin pá--ooh!
zh_xc: 你別看他是個小不點，他力氣可大著！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Don't underestimate him just because he's small, his strength is tremendous!

nan_sentence: 這个師傅的寸步，逐過攏嘛做甲一必一中。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê sai-hū ê tshùn-pōo, ta̍k-kuè lóng mā tsò kah it-pit-it-tiòng.
zh_xc: 這個師傅的尺寸，每次都做得非常精準。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The size of this master's work is always done very accurately.

nan_sentence: 咱七月半普渡彼工，菜碗著攢較腥臊咧，來拜好兄弟仔。
nan_tailo: Lán Tshit-gue̍h-puànn phóo-tōo hit kang, tshài-uánn tio̍h tshuân khah tshenn-tshau--leh, lâi pài hó-hiann-tī-á.
zh_xc: 咱們中元普渡那天，供品得準備豐盛點，來祭拜好兄弟。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: On the day of our Zhongyuan Pudu (Hungry Ghost Festival), we need to prepare abundant offerings to worship our good brothers.

nan_sentence: 拚暝工，七晏八晏才去睏。
nan_tailo: Piànn mê-kang, tshit-uànn-peh-uànn tsiah khì khùn.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Working late into the night, going to bed very late.

nan_sentence: 人額有夠，才會用得買團體票。
nan_tailo: Lâng-gia̍h ū-kàu, tsiah ē-īng-tit bé thuân-thé-phiò.
zh_xc: 人數足夠，才可以買團體票。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You can buy group tickets only if there are enough people.

nan_sentence: 咱遮有八个人，遐的物件才五人額，猶無夠三个人額。
nan_tailo: Lán tsia ū peh ê lâng, hia-ê mi̍h-kiānn tsiah gōo lâng-gia̍h, iáu bô-kàu sann ê lâng-gia̍h.
zh_xc: 咱們這兒有八個人，那些東西才五人份，還不夠三人份。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We have eight people here, those things are only enough for five people, still short of three people's share.

nan_sentence: 伊生做人懸漢大，氣力飽，夯的貨自然比人較濟。
nan_tailo: I senn-tsò lâng-kuân-hàn-tuā, khuì-la̍t pá, giâ ê huè tsū-jiân pí lâng khah tsē.
zh_xc: 他人高馬大，力氣十足，扛的貨自然比別人還多。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is tall and strong, full of energy, naturally carrying more goods than others.

nan_sentence: 拜託伊做代誌，伊攏做甲真入心。
nan_tailo: Pài-thok i tsò tāi-tsì, i lóng tsò kah tsin ji̍p-sim.
zh_xc: 拜託他做事，他都做得很用心。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When asked to do something, he always does it with great dedication.

zh_xc: 疼惜人家，就要真心疼愛。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you cherish someone, you should love them sincerely.

nan_sentence: 教示的話伊攏會記入心。
nan_tailo: Kà-sī ê uē i lóng ē kì ji̍p-sim.
zh_xc: 訓示的話他都聽得進去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He takes all the advice to heart.

nan_sentence: 攑刀的時愛攑刀柄，毋通去捎刀鋩。
nan_tailo: Gia̍h to ê sî ài gia̍h to-pènn, m̄-thang khì sa to-mê.
zh_xc: 拿刀的時候要拿刀柄，不要拿刀刃。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When holding a knife, hold the handle, not the blade.

nan_sentence: 伊力草真飽，工課做規工嘛袂忝。
nan_tailo: I la̍t-tsháu tsin pá, khang-khuè tsò kui-kang mā bē thiám.
zh_xc: 他精體力充沛，工作一整天也不累。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is full of energy and vitality, not getting tired even after working all day.

nan_sentence: 彼箍行路使三角六肩，袂輸𨑨迌人。
nan_tailo: Hit-khoo kiânn-lōo sái sann-kak-la̍k-king, bē-su tshit-thô-lâng.
zh_xc: 那傢伙走路大搖大擺的，就像黑道中人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: That guy walks with a swagger, just like a member of the underworld.

nan_sentence: 報名到昨昏是上尾工，今仔日才欲報就袂赴矣。
nan_tailo: Pò-miâ kàu tsa-hng sī siōng-bué kang, kin-á-ji̍t tsiah beh pò tō bē-hù--ah.
zh_xc: 報名到昨天是最後一天，今天才要報名就來不及了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Registration was until yesterday, it's too late to register today.
The last one

nan_sentence: 這个囡仔誠袂上教，較教都教袂曉。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê gín-á tsiânn bē tsiūnn-kà, khah kà to kà bē-hiáu.
zh_xc: 這個孩子很不受教，怎麼教都教不會。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This child is very disobedient, no matter how you teach, he just doesn't learn.

nan_sentence: 這尾魚仔上無有三斤重。
nan_tailo: Tsit bué hî-á siōng-bô ū sann kin tāng.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This fish weighs at least three catties.

nan_sentence: 我轉來欲攢下晝頓，行入灶跤就看著大漢查某囝當咧煮矣。
nan_tailo: Guá tńg-lâi beh tshuân ē-tàu-tǹg, kiânn ji̍p tsàu-kha tō khuànn-tio̍h tuā-hàn tsa-bóo-kiánn tng-teh tsú--ah.
zh_xc: 我回來要做午飯，走進廚房就看到大女兒正在煮了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I came back to make lunch, and as soon as I walked into the kitchen, I saw my eldest daughter was already cooking.
Long-held wish

nan_sentence: 這久年症頭矣，著愛耐心治療，沓沓仔調養，才會見效。
nan_tailo: Tse kú-nî tsìng-thâu--ah, tio̍h-ài nāi-sim tī-liâu, ta̍uh-ta̍uh-á tiâu-ióng, tsiah ē kiàn-hāu.
zh_xc: 這是老毛病了，得要耐心治療，慢慢調養，才會見效。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This is an old problem, it needs to be treated with patience, slowly nurtured, and then it will take effect.

nan_sentence: 大人大種矣，著較會曉想咧，毋通閣予序大人操煩。
nan_tailo: Tuā-lâng-tuā-tsíng--ah, tio̍h khah ē-hiáu siūnn--leh, m̄-thang koh hōo sī-tuā-lâng tshau-huân.
zh_xc: 老大不小了，想法得要成熟一點，不要再讓父母操心。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You're not young anymore, your thinking needs to be more mature, don't let your parents worry about you anymore.

nan_sentence: 大人大種矣，磕袂著就起跤動手，有夠卸世眾！
nan_tailo: Tuā-lâng-tuā-tsíng--ah, kha̍p-bē-tio̍h tō khí-kha-tāng-tshiú, ū-kàu sià-sì-tsìng.
zh_xc: 都是大人了，動不動就拳腳相向，非常丟人現眼。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You're all adults, but you resort to fists and feet at the drop of a hat. It's extremely embarrassing.

nan_sentence: 風颱過了後，欲去抾大水柴著愛遵守法規。
nan_tailo: Hong-thai kuè liáu-āu, beh khì khioh tuā-tsuí-tshâ tio̍h-ài tsun-siú huat-kui.
zh_xc: 颱風過後，要去撿漂流木得要遵守法規。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: After the typhoon, you must follow the regulations when picking up driftwood.
Farmers harvest in December, mustard greens are in full production.

nan_sentence: 果子大出的時上好食，價數閣俗。
nan_tailo: Kué-tsí tuā-tshut ê sî siōng hó-tsia̍h, kè-siàu koh sio̍k.
zh_xc: 水果類盛產時最好吃，價格又便宜。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's best to eat fruits when they are in season, and the prices are also cheaper.

nan_sentence: 伊逐改送禮，攏是大出手，毋是大鮑魚就是高麗參。
nan_tailo: I ta̍k-kái sàng-lé, lóng sī tuā-tshut-tshiú, m̄-sī tuā pau-hî tō sī ko-lê-sim.
zh_xc: 他每次送禮，總是出手大方，不是大鮑魚就是人參。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Every time he gives a gift, he is always generous, giving either large abalones or ginseng.

nan_sentence: 我感覺做人毋通傷大目孔。
nan_tailo: Guá kám-kak tsò-lâng m̄-thang siunn tuā-ba̍k-khóng.
zh_xc: 我覺得做人不要太勢利眼。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I think one should not be too mercenary in life.
A large sum of money, a handful of banknotes.
Burn a lot of joss paper

zh_xc: 俗語，為了賺大錢，導致人面黃肌瘦。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In colloquial terms, trying to make a fortune leads to a haggard appearance.
Large bills

nan_sentence: 𪜶兜是大家口，三頓煮食攏用大灶。
nan_tailo: In tau sī tuā-ke-kháu, sann-tǹg tsú-tsia̍h lóng īng tuā-tsàu.
zh_xc: 他家是個大家庭，三餐的烹調都用大灶。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His family is a large one, and they use a large stove for cooking all three meals.

nan_sentence: 你大身大命，出入行踏愛細膩喔！
nan_tailo: Lí tuā-sin-tuā-miā, tshut-ji̍p kiânn-ta̍h ài sè-jī--ooh!
zh_xc: 你身懷六甲，出入走路行動要小心喔！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You're pregnant, be careful when you move around and walk!

nan_sentence: 看著𪜶有身的新婦佇咧摒掃，阿婆就會喝講：「大身大命喔！我來就好。」
nan_tailo: Khuànn-tio̍h in ū-sin ê sin-pū tī-leh piànn-sàu, a-pô tō ē huah kóng, "Tuā-sin-tuā-miā--ooh! Guá lâi tō hó."
zh_xc: 看到她懷孕的媳婦在打掃，阿婆就會說：「一身二命喔！我來就好。」
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Seeing her pregnant daughter-in-law cleaning, the grandmother would say: "You're carrying two lives! I'll do it."

nan_sentence: 做彼款生理，毋是趁大錢，就是了大注。
nan_tailo: Tsò hit khuán sing-lí, m̄ sī thàn tuā-tsînn, tō sī liáu tuā-tù.
zh_xc: 做那種生意，不是賺大錢，就是賠大錢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Doing that kind of business, you either make a lot of money or lose a lot of money.

nan_sentence: 看兩个大肥相偃，實在真古錐，尻川䫌予人看現現。
nan_tailo: Khuànn nn̄g ê tuā-puî sio-ián, si̍t-tsāi tsin kóo-tsui, kha-tshng-phué hōo lâng khuànn-hiān-hiān.
zh_xc: 看兩個肥胖的人在相撲，實在很可愛，屁股肉讓人看得一清二楚。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Watching two fat people sumo wrestling is really cute, their buttock flesh is clearly visible.

nan_sentence: 以前的人對屎礐仔舀屎尿起來，囥予伊發酵過，變做大肥，就聽好沃菜。
nan_tailo: Í-tsîng ê lâng tuì sái-ha̍k-á iúnn sái-jiō khí--lâi, khǹg hōo i huat-kànn--kuè, piàn-tsò tuā-puî, tō thìng-hó ak-tshài.
zh_xc: 以前的人從糞坑舀屎糞上來，放著讓它發酵後，成為糞肥，就可以澆菜。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In the past, people scooped up feces from the pit, let it ferment, and then it became manure, which could be used to water the vegetables.

nan_sentence: 我這陣拄好無散票，大張的予你找敢好？
nan_tailo: Guá tsit-tsūn tú-hó bô suánn-phiò, tuā-tiunn--ê hōo lí tsāu kám hó?
zh_xc: 我這會兒剛好沒有小鈔，大鈔讓你找錢好嗎？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I happen to have no small bills right now, is it okay for you to give me change for a large bill?

nan_sentence: 咱明仔早起招恁大細腎來去𬦰山。
nan_tailo: Lán bîn-á-tsá-khí tsio lín tuā-sè-siān lâi-khì peh-suann.
zh_xc: 我們明天早上邀你連襟一起去爬山。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We invite you to go mountain climbing with us tomorrow morning.

nan_sentence: 伊是大漢囝，愛照顧小弟、小妹。
nan_tailo: I sī tuā-hàn-kiánn, ài tsiàu-kòo sió-tī, sió-muē.
zh_xc: 他是長子，得要照顧弟弟、妹妹。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is the eldest son, and has to take care of his younger brothers and sisters.

nan_sentence: 你開毋著向矣啦！緊大翻頭斡倒轉來。
nan_tailo: Lí khui m̄-tio̍h hiòng--ah--lah! Kín tuā-huan-thâu uat tò-tńg--lâi.
zh_xc: 你開錯方向了，趕快大回轉開回頭來。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You're going the wrong way, quickly make a U-turn and come back.

nan_sentence: 頭前地場較闊，你車開去遐大翻頭，按呢較好轉踅。
nan_tailo: Thâu-tsîng tē-tiûnn khah khuah, lí tshia khui khì hia tuā-huan-thâu, án-ne khah hó tńg-se̍h.
zh_xc: 前面場地較寬敞，你車子開去那邊大回轉，這樣比較方便轉回頭。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The space in front is more spacious. Drive your car over there and make a big turn, it's more convenient to turn around this way.

nan_sentence: 囡仔咧睏晝，你毋通遐爾大嚨喉空。
nan_tailo: Gín-á teh khùn-tàu, lí m̄-thang hiah-nī tuā-nâ-âu-khang.
zh_xc: 孩子在睡午覺，你別那麼大嗓門。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The child is taking a nap, don't be so loud.

nan_sentence: 伊是咱遮出名的大嚨喉空，遠遠就會當聽著伊講話的聲矣。
nan_tailo: I sī lán tsia tshut-miâ ê tuā-nâ-âu-khang, hn̄g-hn̄g tō ē-tàng thiann-tio̍h i kóng-uē ê siann--ah.
zh_xc: 他是我們這裡出了名的大嗓門，遠遠地就可以聽到他的聲音了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is famously loud in our area, you can hear his voice from a distance.

nan_sentence: 伊的成績佇𪜶彼班干焦算中中仔爾爾。
nan_tailo: I ê sîng-tsik tī in hit pan kan-na sǹg tiong-tiong--á niā-niā.
zh_xc: 他的成績在班上只能算中等而已。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His grades can only be considered average in the class.

nan_sentence: 阿爸的身材中範中範，看起來袂肥嘛無偌瘦。
nan_tailo: A-pah ê sin-tsâi tiong-pān-tiong-pān, khuànn--khí-lâi bē puî mā bô guā sán.
zh_xc: 父親的身材中等，看起來不肥也不太瘦。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The father's body is medium-sized, looking neither fat nor too thin.

nan_sentence: 作穡人將採收了的荷蘭豆分做三級：䆀的、中範的、媠的。
nan_tailo: Tsoh-sit-lâng tsiong tshái-siu liáu ê Huê-liân-tāu hun-tsò sann kip: bái--ê, tiong-pān--ê, suí--ê.
zh_xc: 農人將採收完的豌豆分成三級：品相不佳的、中等的、優良的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The farmer will divide the harvested peas into three grades: those of poor quality, mediocre ones, and excellent ones.

nan_sentence: 教囡仔行五子直，會當提升𪜶的智力。
nan_tailo: Kà gín-á kiânn gōo-jí-ti̍t, ē-tàng thê-sing in ê tì-li̍k.
zh_xc: 教孩子下五子棋，可以提升他們的智力。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Teaching children to play Go can enhance their intelligence.

nan_sentence: 這擔的炒塗豆，逐粒都仁仁仁。
nan_tailo: Tsit tànn ê tshá thôo-tāu, ta̍k lia̍p to jîn-jîn-jîn.
zh_xc: 這一攤的炒花生，每一顆都非常飽滿。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The stir-fried peanuts at this stall are very plump, every single one of them.

nan_sentence: 伊有咧練走標，跤肚肉仁仁仁。
nan_tailo: I ū teh liān tsáu-pio, kha-tóo-bah jîn-jîn-jîn.
zh_xc: 他有在練跑步，小腿肚的肌肉非常結實。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has been practicing running, the muscles in his calves are very firm.

nan_sentence: 這本諺語集所收的臺灣話，逐句都仁仁仁。
nan_tailo: Tsit pún gān-gí-tsi̍p sóo siu ê Tâi-uân-uē, ta̍k kù to jîn-jîn-jîn.
zh_xc: 這本諺語集所收的臺灣話，每一句都是精挑細選的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The Taiwanese sayings collected in this proverb book are all carefully selected.

nan_sentence: 粗糠還粗糠，冇粟還冇粟。
nan_tailo: Tshoo-khng huān tshoo-khng, phànn-tshik huān phànn-tshik.
zh_xc: 稻穀的外殼歸稻穀的外殼，糠秕歸糠秕，不能混在一起。俗語，比喻兩類事物不可混為一談。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The husk of the rice should go with the husk, and the chaff with the chaff, they cannot be mixed together. This is a proverb, metaphorically suggesting that two different things should not be confused as one.

zh_xc: 糠秕收進好的籮筐裡。俗語，比喻無能者佔據好職位。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The chaff is gathered into a good basket. This is a proverb, which is used to metaphorically describe the situation where an incompetent person occupies a good position.

zh_xc: 俗語，比喻傳染病流行時，體弱的人容易被感染。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In colloquial terms, it refers to the idea that during an epidemic, people with weak constitutions are more likely to get infected.

nan_sentence: 伊進前都已經認罪矣，這馬煞來反口供。
nan_tailo: I tsìn-tsîng to í-king jīn-tsuē--ah, tsit-má suah lâi huán-kháu-king.
zh_xc: 他之前都已經認罪了，現在卻來翻供。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He had already pleaded guilty before, but now he's recanting his confession.

nan_sentence: 塗面快收成，人面快反形。
nan_tailo: Thôo-bīn khuài siu-sîng, lâng-bīn khuài huán-hîng.
zh_xc: 在土地耕種容易收成；看人的臉色，容易遭人背棄。俗語，努力耕耘，才有收穫；看人臉色，不易過活。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's easy to harvest when farming the land; looking at people's faces, it's easy to be abandoned. In common sayings, hard work brings harvest; relying on others' favor, it's hard to live.

nan_sentence: 伊最近咧反形，加真荏懶。
nan_tailo: I tsuè-kīn teh huán-hîng, ke tsin lám-nuā.
zh_xc: 他最近一反常態，變得很懶惰。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has recently changed his usual behavior and become very lazy.

zh_xc: 茄子一般都開紫色的花，開黃花的就是變種。歇後語，形容違反常態。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Eggplants usually bloom purple flowers; those that bloom yellow flowers are variants. This is a metaphor, describing something against the norm.

nan_sentence: 這馬的臺灣囡仔袂曉講母語，毋是𪜶反種去矣，是𪜶的爸母毋肯對𪜶講母語。
nan_tailo: Tsit-má ê Tâi-uân gín-á bē-hiáu kóng bú-gí, m̄ sī in huán-tsíng--khì--ah, sī in ê pē-bú m̄-khíng tuì in kóng bú-gí.
zh_xc: 現在臺灣的小孩子不會說母語，不是他們發生了突變，而是他們的父母不肯對他們說母語。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The reason why children in Taiwan can't speak their mother tongue now is not because they have undergone a mutation, but because their parents refuse to speak their mother tongue to them.
Mixed-race people are generally smarter.

nan_sentence: 拄著困難，若袂曉反變，就踅袂過。
nan_tailo: Tú-tio̍h khùn-lân, nā bē-hiáu píng-pìnn, tō se̍h bē kuè.
zh_xc: 碰到困難，如果不會應變，就轉圜不過來。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When encountering difficulties, if you cannot respond, you will not be able to get through.

zh_xc: 近來制度經常進行重大的改變。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Recently, the system has undergone significant changes.

nan_sentence: 欠錢還數是天公地道的代誌。
nan_tailo: Khiàm-tsînn hîng-siàu sī thinn-kong-tē-tō ê tāi-tsì.
zh_xc: 欠債還錢是天經地義的事情。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Paying back debts is a matter of course.

nan_sentence: 初九天公生，咱做伙求天公伯仔保庇咱一家口仔平安順序。
nan_tailo: Tshe-káu Thinn-kong-senn, lán tsò-hué kiû Thinn-kong-peh--á pó-pì lán tsi̍t ke-kháu-á pîng-an sūn-sī.
zh_xc: 初九天老爺老天爺誕辰公生，我們一起求老天爺保佑一家大小平安順利。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: On the ninth day, it's the birthday of the Heavenly Grandfather, we pray together to the Heavenly Grandfather to bless our family with peace and smoothness.

zh_xc: 天庭飽滿，是相學上的多福之相。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A full forehead is considered a sign of great fortune in physiognomy.

zh_xc: 俗語，男人以額頭飽滿，女人以下顎豐滿為福相。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In common saying, a man with a full forehead and a woman with a full lower jaw are considered to have signs of good fortune.

nan_sentence: 少年人愛較拍拚咧，才袂食老毋成樣。
nan_tailo: Siàu-liân-lâng ài khah phah-piànn--leh, tsiah bē tsia̍h-lāu m̄-tsiânn-iūnn.
zh_xc: 年輕人得要努力一點，年老時才不會不成個樣子。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Young people need to work a little harder, so they won't be unaccomplished when they're old.

nan_sentence: 老師共我講：「你猶少歲，日子猶誠長，前途著拍算一下。」
nan_tailo: Lāu-su kā guá kóng, "Lí iáu tsió-huè, ji̍t-tsí iáu tsiânn tn̂g, tsiân-tôo tio̍h phah-sǹg--tsi̍t-ē."
zh_xc: 老師跟我說：「你還年輕，日子還很長，該為前途打算一下。」
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The teacher said to me, "You are still young, and have a long life ahead of you. You should start planning for your future."

nan_sentence: 學工夫，若有人引𤆬，較緊學上手。
nan_tailo: O̍h kang-hu, nā ū lâng ín-tshuā, khah kín o̍h tsiūnn-tshiú.
zh_xc: 學習技藝，如果有人引導，比較快熟練。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Learning skills, if someone guides, becomes more proficient quickly.

nan_sentence: 伊心狂火熱，趕欲赴銀行三點半。
nan_tailo: I sim-kông-hué-jia̍t, kuánn beh hù gîn-hâng sann-tiám-puànn.
zh_xc: 他心急如焚，要趕銀行三點半。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is anxious as if on pins and needles, needing to rush to the bank by three-thirty.

nan_sentence: 伊簽六合彩，痟甲心狂火熱。
nan_tailo: I tshiam lio̍k-ha̍p-tshái, siáu kah sim-kông-hué-jia̍t.
zh_xc: 他簽賭六合彩，瘋狂到不能自已。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He gambles on the Mark Six lottery, madly out of control.

nan_sentence: 伊聽甲心花開，隨就笑咍咍。
nan_tailo: I thiann kah sim-hue-khui, suî tō tshiò-hai-hai.
zh_xc: 他聽得心花怒放，馬上就哈哈笑。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He was overjoyed to hear it and immediately burst into laughter.

nan_sentence: 頭家今仔日心花開，講年底獎金欲發三個月。
nan_tailo: Thâu-ke kin-á-ji̍t sim-hue-khui, kóng nî-té tsióng-kim beh huat sann kò gue̍h.
zh_xc: 老闆今天心情大好，說年終獎金要發三個月份。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The boss is in a great mood today, saying that the year-end bonus will be equivalent to three months' salary.

nan_sentence: 伊拄失戀，逐工攏心慒慒。
nan_tailo: I tú sit-luân, ta̍k-kang lóng sim tso-tso.
zh_xc: 他剛失戀，每天都心煩意亂鬱鬱寡歡。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He just had a breakup, and he is upset and depressed every day.

nan_sentence: 這个人手爪賤，咱物件愛較斟酌咧。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê lâng tshiú-jiáu-tsiān, lán mi̍h-kiānn ài khah tsim-tsiok--leh.
zh_xc: 這個人手腳不乾淨，我們東西要多加注意。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This person is not honest, we need to pay extra attention to our belongings.

nan_sentence: 伊的手股頭有刺字， 穿吊䘥仔就看現現。
nan_tailo: I ê tshiú-kóo-thâu ū tshiah-jī, tshīng tiàu-kah-á tō khuànn-hiān-hiān.
zh_xc: 他的上手臂有刺青，穿無袖內衣就看得清清楚楚。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has a tattoo on his upper arm, which is clearly visible when he wears a sleeveless undershirt.

nan_sentence: 伊用手後曲共我㧎撞一下，暗示我伊欲先離開一下。
nan_tailo: I īng tshiú-āu-khiau kā guá khê tōng--tsi̍t-ē, àm-sī guá i beh sing lī-khui--tsi̍t-ē.
zh_xc: 他用手肘碰我一下，暗示我他要先離開一下。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He nudged me with his elbow, hinting that he wanted to leave for a while.
Worker

nan_sentence: 阮出外人手面趁食，逐日著做粗工來度三頓。
nan_tailo: Guán tshut-guā-lâng tshiú-bīn thàn-tsia̍h, ta̍k-ji̍t tio̍h tsò tshoo-kang lâi tōo sann-tǹg.
zh_xc: 我們出外人靠勞力賺錢，每天得要幹粗活來糊口。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We make a living by hard labor when we are abroad, and we have to do heavy work every day to make ends meet.

nan_sentence: 咱是手面趁食的，哪有彼號冗剩錢通出國觀光。
nan_tailo: Lán sī tshiú-bīn-thàn-tsia̍h--ê, ná ū hit-lō liōng-siōng tsînn thang tshut-kok kuan-kong?
zh_xc: 咱們是微薄收入僅夠糊口，哪有那種閒錢出國觀光呢？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We have a meager income that is barely enough to make ends meet, how could we afford to travel abroad?

nan_sentence: 看展覽的時，千萬莫手賤去摸展覽品。
nan_tailo: Khuànn tián-lám ê sî, tshian-bān mài tshiú-tsiān khì bong tián-lám-phín.
zh_xc: 看展覽時，千萬別手癢去摸展覽品。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When viewing an exhibition, never touch the exhibits.

nan_sentence: 伊講白賊，予𪜶老爸拍手蹄仔。
nan_tailo: I kóng-pe̍h-tsha̍t, hōo in lāu-pē phah tshiú-tê-á.
zh_xc: 他說謊，被他爸爸打手心。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He lied and was spanked on the palm by his father.

zh_xc: 他管不住手腳就愛摸東摸西。有時也指他有順手牽羊的惡癖。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He can't control his hands and feet and loves to touch things. Sometimes it also refers to his bad habit of taking advantage of situations to steal things.

nan_sentence: 相命仙共伊看手相講：「手縫櫳，財產空，隨趁隨空空。」
nan_tailo: Siòng-miā-sian kā i khuànn tshiú-siòng kóng, "Tshiú-phāng lang, tsâi-sán khang, suî thàn suî khang-khang."
zh_xc: 算命先生看了他的手相後說：「手指間縫隙大，財產空，馬上賺馬上空。」
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The fortune teller looked at his palm and said, "The large gaps between your fingers indicate that wealth slips through. What you earn immediately disappears."

zh_xc: 月暈出現，烈日會曝曬草坪，必有大旱。這是傳統俗諺，不是科學事實。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A halo around the moon, the sun will scorch the lawn, a great drought is imminent. This is a traditional saying, not a scientific fact.

nan_sentence: 真濟人相信烏鴉咧吼表示歹吉兆。
nan_tailo: Tsin tsē lâng siong-sìn oo-a leh háu piáu-sī pháinn-kiat-tiāu.
zh_xc: 很多人相信烏鴉在啼叫表示凶兆。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Many people believe that a crow's cawing signifies a bad omen.

nan_sentence: 透早就聽著遮爾歹吉兆的話，實在有夠衰。
nan_tailo: Thàu-tsá tō thiann-tio̍h tsiah-nī pháinn-kiat-tiāu ê uē, si̍t-tsāi ū-kàu sue.
zh_xc: 一大早就聽到這麼不吉利的話，實在很倒楣。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Hearing such unlucky words early in the morning is really bad luck.

nan_sentence: 三更半暝走去墓仔埔，你敢毋驚去看著歹物仔？
nan_tailo: Sann-kenn-puànn-mê tsáu khì bōng-á-poo, lí kám m̄-kiann khì khuànn-tio̍h pháinn-mih-á?
zh_xc: 三更半夜跑到墓園墳場去，你難道不怕看到鬼嗎？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Running to the cemetery in the middle of the night, aren't you afraid of seeing ghosts?

nan_sentence: 醫生檢查出伊腹肚內有生歹物仔。
nan_tailo: I-sing kiám-tsa tshut i pak-tóo-lāi ū senn pháinn-mih-á.
zh_xc: 醫生檢查出他肚子裡長了惡性腫瘤。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The doctor found a malignant tumor in his stomach.

nan_sentence: 伊無因為我生做較歹看面就棄嫌我。
nan_tailo: I bô in-uī guá senn-tsò khah pháinn-khuànn-bīn tō khì-hiâm--guá.
zh_xc: 他不因為我長得較難看就嫌棄我。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He doesn't reject me just because I'm not very good-looking.

nan_sentence: 人講「輸人毋輸陣，輸陣歹看面」，咱著愛較拍拚咧。
nan_tailo: Lâng kóng "Su lâng m̄ su tīn, su tīn pháinn-khuànn-bīn", lán tio̍h-ài khah phah-piànn--leh.
zh_xc: 人家俗話說「輸給某人無所謂，別排在最後，在最後一名就太難看了」，我們就得要努力點。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: There is a common saying, "It doesn't matter if you lose to someone, just don't be the last, being the last one is too embarrassing." We have to try harder.
Get angry, turn face (which means to become hostile or suddenly start to behave in a different way towards someone)
Confront with an angry face

zh_xc: 面相雖不友善卻容易達成買賣。面惡心善，熟語。比喻外貌不和善卻很好相處。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Although the face is not friendly, it is easy to make deals. The face is fierce but the heart is kind, a familiar saying. It's a metaphor for someone who may not look kind, but is very easy to get along with.
The situation of the lawsuit is gradually becoming less optimistic.

nan_sentence: 人情留一線，日後才袂歹面相看。
nan_tailo: Jîn-tsîng lâu tsi̍t suànn, ji̍t-āu tsiah bē pháinn-bīn-sio-khuànn.
zh_xc: 人情留一線，改天才不會惡臉相向。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Leave a line in human relations, so you won't face each other with hostility in the future.

nan_sentence: 𪜶兩个門扇枋鬥袂峇，見擺見面攏歹面相看。
nan_tailo: In nn̄g-ê mn̂g-sìnn-pang tàu bē bā, kiàn-pái kìnn-bīn lóng pháinn-bīn-sio-khuànn.
zh_xc: 他們倆個性不合，每次見面都惡臉相向。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Their personalities clash, they always face each other with a hostile expression every time they meet.

zh_xc: 棉紗浸到水就很難紡織。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's difficult to spin cotton yarn once it's soaked in water.
The situation is getting more and more complicated.

nan_sentence: 作穡人生活無好過，豐收的時農產品歹價，歹年冬閣收無通食。
nan_tailo: Tsoh-sit-lâng sing-ua̍h bô hó kuè, hong-siu ê sî lông-sán-phín pháinn-kè, pháinn-nî-tang koh siu bô thang tsia̍h.
zh_xc: 農民生活不好過，豐收時農產品賤價，欠收時又入不敷出。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Farmers' lives are tough. When the harvest is plentiful, the price of agricultural products is low. When the harvest is poor, they can't make ends meet.

nan_sentence: 這个囡仔歹喙斗，真揀食，飼甲強欲變毋成囡仔。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê gín-á pháinn-tshuì-táu, tsin kíng-tsia̍h, tshī kah kiōng-beh piàn m̄-tsiânn-gín-á.
zh_xc: 這個小孩胃口不好，很挑食，養得快要變成發育不良的小孩了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This child has a poor appetite and is very picky with food, almost becoming a malnourished child.

nan_sentence: 你這个毋成囡仔，食飽取跋筊，枉費恁爸母共你晟養甲遮大漢。
nan_tailo: Lí tsit ê m̄-tsiânn-gín-á, tsia̍h-pá tshú pua̍h-kiáu, óng-huì lín pē-bú kā lí tshiânn-ióng kah tsiah tuā-hàn.
zh_xc: 你這個小混混，吃飽只會賭博，枉費你父母把你養育得這麼大。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You little rascal, all you do after eating is gamble. It's a waste that your parents raised you to be so big.

nan_sentence: 公證人看水尺來計算貨船的載貨量。
nan_tailo: Kong-tsìng-jîn khuànn tsuí-tshioh lâi kè-sǹg huè-tsûn ê tsài-huè liōng.
zh_xc: 公證人看水尺來計算貨船的載貨量。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The notary uses a water gauge to calculate the cargo load of the freighter.
Ripples emerge

nan_sentence: 這馬咱攏無咧納水租矣，攏嘛政府替咱納的。
nan_tailo: Tsit-má lán lóng bô teh la̍p tsuí-tsoo--ah, lóng mā tsìng-hú thè lán la̍p--ê.
zh_xc: 現在我們都不用繳水利會費，都是政府代繳的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Now we don't have to pay the water utility fees, the government pays it for us.

zh_xc: 繳納水利會費。也用來戲稱在外時去公廁或借用人家的廁所小便
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Pay the water conservancy association fee. It is also used jokingly to refer to going to a public toilet or borrowing someone else's toilet to urinate when you are out.

nan_sentence: 咱兄弟姊妹就像仝一條水脈流出來的啦。
nan_tailo: Lán hiann-tī-tsí-muē tō tshiūnn kāng tsi̍t tiâu tsuí-me̍h lâu--tshut-lâi--ê--lah.
zh_xc: 我們兄弟姊妹就像同一條水系流出來的一樣。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We siblings are like rivers flowing from the same watershed.

zh_xc: 稻穀用水碓碾過，變成白米，不會留下糙米。俗語，比喻做事精密的人不會疏忽。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The rice grains are ground with a water mill, turning into white rice, without leaving any brown rice behind. This is a common saying, used as a metaphor for a meticulous person who will not be negligent.

nan_sentence: 水牛上愛佇水窟仔滒浴。
nan_tailo: Tsuí-gû siōng ài tī tsuí-khut-á kō-i̍k.
zh_xc: 水牛最愛在水坑裡打滾洗澡。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Water buffaloes love to roll around and bathe in water holes.

nan_sentence: 車囥佇外口，落雨了後煞卡一沿水鉎。
nan_tailo: Tshia khǹg tī guā-kháu, lo̍h-hōo liáu-āu suah kha̍h tsi̍t iân tsuí-sian.
zh_xc: 車子放外面，下雨之後卻卡積了一層水垢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The car was left outside, and after the rain, it was covered with a layer of water stains.
The spark is about to go out.

nan_sentence: 等咧咱佇火車頭的前驛相等，做伙坐後一幫火車上北。
nan_tailo: Tán--leh lán tī hué-tshia-thâu ê tsîng-ia̍h sio-tán, tsò-hué tsē āu tsi̍t pang hué-tshia tsiūnn-pak.
zh_xc: 等一下我們在火車站的前站見，一起坐下一班火車北上。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Wait for me at the front of the train station, we will take the next train heading north together.

nan_sentence: 熱天暗時佇山頂看火金星閃閃爍爍的光景是一款享受。
nan_tailo: Jua̍h-thinn àm-sî tī suann-tíng khuànn hué-kim-tshenn siám-siám-sih-sih ê kong-kíng sī tsi̍t khuán hiáng-siū.
zh_xc: 夏天夜晚在山上看螢火蟲一閃一閃的光景是一種享受。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Watching the fireflies flicker on a mountain on a summer night is a kind of enjoyment.

nan_sentence: 兩條電線相拍電，出火金星。
zh_xc: 兩條電線發生短路，冒出火花。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Two electrical wires short-circuited, sparking flames.

nan_sentence: 我無細膩去跋一倒，目睭出火金星，差一屑仔就昏倒。
nan_tailo: Guá bô-sè-jī khì pua̍h tsi̍t tó, ba̍k-tsiu tshut hué-kim-tshenn, tsha tsi̍t-sut-á tō hūn--tó.
zh_xc: 我不小心摔了一跤，眼冒金星，差一點昏倒。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I accidentally tripped and fell, seeing stars, and almost passed out.

nan_sentence: 這个人是火烌性，較會得失人。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê lâng sī hué-hu-sìng, khah ē tik-sit--lâng.
zh_xc: 這個人是火暴性子，比較容易得罪人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This person has a fiery temper and tends to offend others easily.

nan_sentence: 有貫牛貫的牛才會乖乖仔照主人的意思作穡。
nan_tailo: Ū kǹg gû-kǹg ê gû tsiah ē kuai-kuai-á tsiàu tsú-lâng ê ì-sù tsoh-sit.
zh_xc: 有穿牛鼻環的牛才會乖乖地依主人的意思耕作。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Only cows with nose rings will obediently plow according to the owner's wishes.

nan_sentence: 我唱歌若牛聲馬喉，毋敢唱予人聽。
nan_tailo: Guá tshiùnn-kua ná gû-siann-bé-âu, m̄-kánn tshiùnn hōo lâng thiann.
zh_xc: 我唱歌破嗓子，不敢唱給別人聽。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I sing until my throat is sore, but I dare not sing for others to hear.

nan_sentence: 你佇遐牛聲馬喉，有夠噪人耳，較細聲咧。
nan_tailo: Lí tī hia gû-siann-bé-âu, ū-kàu tshò-lâng-hīnn, khah sè-siann--leh.
zh_xc: 你在那邊大聲吆喝，非常刺耳，小聲點。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You are shouting loudly over there, it's very harsh to the ears, lower your voice a bit.

nan_sentence: 散會的時，阮有攢三、四百塊王梨酥，佇大門口送予人客。
nan_tailo: Suànn-huē ê sî, guán ū tshuân sann, sì-pah tè ông-lâi-soo, tī tuā mn̂g-kháu sàng hōo lâng-kheh.
zh_xc: 散會時，我們準備了三、四百塊鳳梨酥，在大門口送給客人。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: At the end of the meeting, we prepared three to four hundred pineapple cakes to give to guests at the main entrance.

nan_sentence: 咱店的生理，攏是主顧客鬥捀場，才有穩定的收入。
nan_tailo: Lán tiàm ê sing-lí lóng sī tsú-kòo-kheh tàu phâng-tiûnn, tsiah ū ún-tīng ê siu-ji̍p.
zh_xc: 我們店裡的生意，全靠主顧幫忙捧場，才有穩定的收入。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The business in our store relies entirely on the support of our customers for a stable income.

nan_sentence: 兄弟若仝心，烏塗變成金。
nan_tailo: Hiann-tī nā kāng-sim, oo-thôo piàn-sîng kim.
zh_xc: 兄弟如果同心，黑土變黃金。俗語，表示兄弟同心可以化腐朽為神奇。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If brothers are of the same mind, barren soil can turn into gold. This is a proverb, indicating that if brothers work together, they can turn decay into magic.

nan_sentence: 咱兩个人差無幾歲，算起來是仝沿的。
nan_tailo: Lán nn̄g ê lâng tsha bô kuí huè, sǹg--khí-lâi sī kāng-iân--ê.
zh_xc: 咱們兩個人相差沒幾歲，算起來是同輩。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The age difference between the two of us is not much, so we can be considered as peers.

nan_sentence: 雖然我佮恁阿爸平歲，毋過論輩無論歲，咱算仝沿的，叫我阿兄就好。
nan_tailo: Sui-jiân guá kah lín a-pa pênn-huè, m̄-koh lūn puè bô lūn huè, lán sǹg kāng-iân--ê, kiò guá a-hiann tō hó.
zh_xc: 雖然我和你爸爸同年齡，但是論輩份不論年紀，咱們算同輩，叫我哥哥就好。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Although I am the same age as your father, in terms of generation rather than age, we are considered the same generation. Just call me brother.

nan_sentence: 欲開學矣，咱等一下來去冊局買新的參考冊。
nan_tailo: Beh khai-ha̍k--ah, lán tán--tsi̍t-ē lâi-khì tsheh-kio̍k bé sin ê tsham-khó-tsheh.
zh_xc: 要開學了，我們等一下到書局買新的參考書。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: School is about to start, we'll go to the bookstore later to buy new reference books.

nan_sentence: 若講著鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流喙瀾。
nan_tailo: Nā kóng-tio̍h gô-bah tang-hún liāu-lí, guá tō ē lâu tshuì-nuā.
zh_xc: 若談到鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流口水。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When it comes to goose meat and winter noodle dishes, I start to drool.

nan_sentence: 這口灶的囝孫仔，逐个都真出擢。
nan_tailo: Tsit kháu-tsàu ê kiánn-sun-á, ta̍k-ê to tsin tshut-tioh.
zh_xc: 這戶人家的子孫，每個都很傑出。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The descendants of this family are all very outstanding.

nan_sentence: 叫甲這號半丁袂做工課。
nan_tailo: Kiò kah tsit-lō puànn-ting bē tsò khang-khuè.
zh_xc: 叫到這種不成材的人做不了事。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Calling such an incompetent person can't get things done.

zh_xc: 病一下竟然變成病夫了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Just one bout of illness and I've suddenly become a sick man.

nan_sentence: 秦假仙是電視布袋戲內底出名的半奸忠。
nan_tailo: Tsîn Ké-sian sī tiān-sī pòo-tē-hì lāi-té tshut-miâ ê puànn-kan-tiong.
zh_xc: 秦假仙是電視布袋戲裡面出名的騎牆派。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Qin Jiaxian is a famous fence-sitter in the puppet show on TV.

nan_sentence: 食甲半老老才開始學電腦。
nan_tailo: Tsia̍h kah puànn-ló-lāu tsiah khai-sí o̍h tiān-náu.
zh_xc: 活到半老時才開始學電腦。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Started learning computers when halfway through life.

nan_sentence: 半遂的會行，臭耳的會聽。
nan_tailo: Puàn-suī--ê ē kiânn, tshàu-hīnn--ê ē thiann.
zh_xc: 半身不遂的會走路，耳聾的能聽到。俗語，比喻奇蹟也。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The half-paralyzed can walk, the deaf can hear. This is a proverb, symbolizing a miracle.

nan_tailo: A̍h bô teh puàn-suī, tio̍h koh lâng kng!
zh_xc: 又不是無能，還得人家抬！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's not that I'm incapable, I still need others to lift me up!

nan_tailo: Khì-tò tsi̍t pái ài sann tiám-tsing kú.
zh_xc: 往返一趟要三個鐘頭久。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A round trip takes three hours.

nan_sentence: 無做無代誌，若做毋好去倒害。
nan_tailo: Bô tsò bô tāi-tsì, nā tsò m̄ hó khì-tò hāi.
zh_xc: 沒做沒事，如果做不好反而糟糕。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: No action, no problem. If done poorly, it's even worse.
In colloquial language, it's an analogy for the more setbacks one faces, the braver one becomes.

nan_sentence: 伊做代誌足工夫，真可取。
nan_tailo: I tsò tāi-tsì tsiok kang-hu, tsin khó-tshú.
zh_xc: 他做事情非常精密細膩，很值得讚許。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is very meticulous and delicate in his work, and is very worthy of praise.

zh_xc: 他們一個像道士，一個像筊杯，形影不離、感情深厚。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: One of them is like a Taoist priest, the other is like a divination block, inseparable and deeply affectionate.

nan_sentence: 去外埠頭趁食，著較保重咧。
nan_tailo: Khì guā-poo-thâu thàn-tsia̍h, tio̍h khah pó-tiōng--leh.
zh_xc: 到外地謀生，要多保重身體。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When going to a foreign place to make a living, take good care of your health.

zh_xc: 立即應允並完成別人的請託
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Immediately agree and fulfill others' requests

nan_sentence: 選舉的時，逐个候選人都講伊上好央教的。
nan_tailo: Suán-kí ê sî, ta̍k ê hāu-suán-jîn to kóng i siōng hó iang-kah--ê.
zh_xc: 選舉時，每個候選人都說他最能受託辦事的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: During the election, every candidate says they are the most trustworthy.

nan_sentence: 布幼仔抾倚來，會使車做桌布。
nan_tailo: Pòo-iù-á khioh-uá--lâi, ē-sái tshia tsò toh-pòo.
zh_xc: 碎布收集起來，可以車成抹布。

nan_sentence: 相分，食有賰；相搶，食無份。

nan_sentence: 趁人冤家相拍，伊也倚去抾肉幼仔鬥拍。

nan_sentence: 家己毋認真拍拚，干焦想欲抾肉幼仔。

nan_sentence: 咱做生理欲簽合約，條件攏愛拆白講才會清楚。

nan_sentence: 拍火兄弟的主要工課就是便若佗位火燒厝就愛去拍火。

nan_sentence: 這陣的車攏自排的較濟，較毋免定定拍速矣。

nan_sentence: 這馬一寡文藝青年真愛戴復古的拍鳥帽。

nan_tailo: Guá sī pàng-ba̍k, m̄ sī bô khuànn-kìnn.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I pretended not to see, not that I didn't see.

nan_sentence: 人總是會做毋著去，你就大事化小，小事化無，放目諒情伊。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: People always make mistakes, you should make a big deal into a small one, and a small one into nothing. Be tolerant and forgive him.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Farmers take turns helping each other with farm work.

nan_sentence: 選舉的時，候選人定會予對頭陣營的人放紙虎，致使影響著伊的選情。

nan_sentence: 這種代誌，你毋通予彼个放送頭知影，若無，規庄仔內的人就隨攏知矣！
nan_tailo: Tsit-tsióng tāi-tsì, lí m̄-thang hōo hit ê hòng-sàng-thâu tsai-iánn, nā-bô, kui-tsng-á-lāi ê  lâng tō suî lóng tsai--ah!
zh_xc: 這種事情，你不要讓那個大嘴巴知道，要不然，全村子的人就馬上都知道了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Don't let that big mouth know about this kind of thing, otherwise, the whole village will know about it immediately.

nan_sentence: 彼个嫌疑犯想欲逃走，警察先對天頂放銃警告。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The suspect tried to escape, so the police fired a warning shot into the air.

nan_sentence: 因為無啥會曉拍麻雀，我定定放銃去予人到。

nan_tailo: Tâi-lâm tē-khu beh khó-tshì ê gín-á ē bé tsiōng-guân-kué lâi tsia̍h, hi-bāng ē-tàng khó-tiâu lí-sióng ê ha̍k-hāu.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Children in the Tainan area who are going to take exams will buy champion cakes to eat, hoping they can get into their ideal schools.

nan_sentence: 狗鯊上適合的料理方式就是做魚漿佮魚丸。

nan_sentence: 阿三上愛佮婦人人狗鯊，實在有夠顧人怨的。
nan_tailo: A-sam siōng ài kah hū-jîn-lâng káu-sua, si̍t-tsāi ū-kàu kòo-lâng-uàn--ê.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Zhang San really enjoys making lewd jokes with women, which is truly annoying.

nan_sentence: 看伊愣愣佇遐攏直目去，踅神踅神，心事重重的款。
nan_tailo: Khuànn i gāng-gāng tī hia lóng ti̍t-ba̍k--khì, se̍h-sîn se̍h-sîn, sim-sū tiông-tiông ê khuán.

nan_sentence: 醫生看伊攏直目去矣，嘛無放棄，繼續共伊急救。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The doctor looked at him straight in the eyes, didn't give up, and continued to perform emergency treatment on him.

nan_sentence: 伊正經頭路無愛做，干焦空思夢想有一日會大趁錢。
nan_tailo: I tsìng-king thâu-lōo bô ài tsò, kan-na khong-su-bōng-sióng ū tsi̍t ji̍t ē tuā thàn-tsînn.

nan_sentence: 伊有一間空殼厝欲稅人。

nan_tailo: I kuà hit lia̍p pió-á kim-siak-siak.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He wears that watch which is sparkling with gold.

nan_sentence: 人若長志，就有機會出脫。

That table is rectangular.

nan_sentence: 心聲合唱團攏是張先生咧𤆬領。

nan_sentence: 咱稅厝的契約用𨑨迌印仔頓就會使矣。

nan_sentence: 你無應該侵門踏戶去揣人算數。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You shouldn't barge into his house and settle accounts with him.

nan_sentence: 保領入房，無保領一世人。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In colloquial terms, a matchmaker is only responsible for making the match and sending the newlyweds into the bridal chamber. They do not guarantee that the couple will have no problems for the rest of their lives. This is extended to mean not taking eternal responsibility.

nan_sentence: 元宵節的時，南北二路的人攏來看「臺灣燈會」。

nan_sentence: 伊毋願予人冤枉坐監，佇監獄咬舌自殺。
nan_tailo: I m̄-guān hōo lâng uan-óng tsē-kann, tī kann-ga̍k kā-tsi̍h tsū-sat.

zh_xc: 他說話經常說得不太流暢，發音不清。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He often speaks in a not very fluent manner, with unclear pronunciation.

nan_sentence: 弓蕉猶無夠分，食著會咬舌。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The banana is not yet ripe, it will taste astringent when eaten.

zh_xc: 奶奶生日是農曆幾月幾號？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: What is grandma's birthday in the lunar calendar?

nan_sentence: 咱人三月二三是媽祖生，臺灣逐所在攏有人咧迎媽祖。

nan_sentence: 咱人著愛存天良、做好代。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We must have a conscience and do good deeds.

nan_sentence: 咱家己的母語著愛咱人拍拚教咱的囡仔來學。
nan_tailo: Lán ka-kī ê bú-gí tio̍h-ài lán-lâng phah-piànn kà lán ê gín-á lâi o̍h.
zh_xc: 我們自己的母語要我們自己努力教我們的孩子來學。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We should strive to teach our children our native language.

nan_sentence: 豬屎籃仔也提出來品並。
nan_tailo: Ti-sái nâ-á iā the̍h tshut-lâi phín-phīng.
zh_xc: 俗語，撿拾豬糞的竹籃子也拿出來誇耀。諷剌人死愛面子，粗俗不值錢的東西也拿出來現寶。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In colloquial terms, it's like bragging about a bamboo basket used for picking up pig dung. It mocks people who are obsessed with face-saving, showing off worthless and vulgar things as if they were treasures.

nan_sentence: 若拄著大節日，有名的餐廳定定攏客滿。
nan_tailo: Nā tú-tio̍h tuā tseh-ji̍t, ū-miâ ê tshan-thiann tiānn-tiānn lóng kheh-buán.
zh_xc: 若是遇到大節日，有名的餐廳常常客滿。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If it's a major holiday, famous restaurants are often full of customers.

nan_sentence: 透早起來就激一个屎面。
nan_tailo: Thàu-tsá khí--lâi tō kik tsi̍t ê sái-bīn.
zh_xc: 一大早起來就板著一張臉。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Waking up early in the morning with a stern face.

nan_sentence: 這間店著愛巷仔內的才會知。
nan_tailo: Tsit king tiàm tio̍h-ài hāng-á-lāi--ê tsiah ē tsai.
zh_xc: 這間店必須是行家才會知道。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Only experts would know about this shop.

nan_sentence: 大學的時，便若放假有閒，阮就會去學校的後壁山運動。
nan_tailo: Tāi-ha̍k ê sî, piān-nā pàng-ká ū-îng, guán tō ē khì ha̍k-hāu ê āu-piah-suann ūn-tōng.
zh_xc: 大學時期，每當放假有空，我們就會去學校的後山運動。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: During university, whenever we had a break, we would go to the hill behind the school for exercise.

nan_sentence: 聽講伊的後壁山誠崎，上好莫去得失伊。
nan_tailo: Thiann-kóng i ê āu-piah-suann tsiânn kiā, siōng-hó mài khì tik-sit--i.
zh_xc: 聽說他的後盾臺很強勢，最好別去招惹得罪他。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I heard that he has a very powerful backing, it's best not to provoke or offend him.

nan_sentence: 欲拜託伊辦，也著前金，也著後謝。
nan_tailo: Beh pài-thok i pān, iā tio̍h tsiân-kim, iā tio̍h āu-siā.
zh_xc: 要委託他辦，也得付訂金，也得付尾款。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you want to entrust him to handle it, you also have to pay a deposit and a final payment.

nan_sentence: 投票的時，若無紮印仔，會使簽名抑是頓指模。
nan_tailo: Tâu-phiò ê sî, nā bô tsah ìn-á, ē-sái tshiam-miâ ia̍h-sī tǹg tsí-bôo.
zh_xc: 投票時，要是沒帶印章，可以簽名或是蓋手印。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When voting, if you don't bring a seal, you can sign or use a fingerprint.

nan_sentence: 古早的小姐，攏著學挑花刺繡。
nan_tailo: Kóo-tsá ê sió-tsiá, lóng tio̍h o̍h thio-hue-tshiah-siù.
zh_xc: 古時候的閨秀，都得學習花草刺繡。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In ancient times, young ladies had to learn flower and plant embroidery.

nan_sentence: 你是咧挑花刺繡是毋？哪會摸遐久？
nan_tailo: Lí sī teh thio-hue-tshiah-siù sī--m̄? Ná ē bong hiah kú?
zh_xc: 你是在刺繡嗎？怎麼會拖那麼久？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Are you embroidering? Why is it taking so long?

nan_sentence: 這袂歹啉，是講，啉了對身體敢無敗害？
nan_tailo: Tse bē pháinn lim, sī-kóng, lim-liáu tuì sin-thé kám bô pāi-hāi?
zh_xc: 這個不難喝，話說回來，喝了對身體不會有害嗎？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This is not hard to drink, but come to think of it, won't it harm the body if consumed?

nan_sentence: 伊生理做了失敗，致使規家伙仔定定枵飢失頓。
nan_tailo: I sing-lí tsò-liáu sit-pāi, tì-sú kui-ke-hué-á tiānn-tiānn iau-ki-sit-tǹg.
zh_xc: 他因為經商失敗，以至於他全家人經常三餐不繼。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Due to his business failure, his entire family often goes without three meals a day.

nan_sentence: 伊幾若頓無食，枵過飢，無體力煞昏倒。
nan_tailo: I kuí-nā tǹg bô tsia̍h, iau-kuè-ki, bô thé-la̍t suah hūn--tó.
zh_xc: 他好幾餐沒吃，餓過頭，沒體力竟暈倒了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He hadn't eaten for several meals, was extremely hungry, and fainted due to lack of strength.

nan_sentence: 做粗工食體力，到食飯的時，腹肚就足枵燥矣。
nan_tailo: Tsò tshoo-kang tsia̍h thé-la̍t, kàu tsia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, pak-tóo tō tsiok iau-sò--ah.
zh_xc: 做粗工耗體力，到用餐時，往往就飢腸轆轆了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Doing heavy labor consumes physical strength, so by mealtime, one is often ravenously hungry.

nan_sentence: 伊誠枵燥，連紲食三碗飯。
nan_tailo: I tsiânn iau-sò, liân-suà tsia̍h sann uánn pn̄g.
zh_xc: 他食欲旺盛，一連吃了三碗飯。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has a strong appetite, and ate three bowls of rice in a row.

nan_sentence: 彼个柝仔頭！叫伊請一頓，袂輸欲共割肉咧。
nan_tailo: Hit-ê kho̍k-á-thâu! Kiò i tshiánn--tsi̍t-tǹg, bē-su beh kā kuah-bah--leh.
zh_xc: 那個小氣鬼！叫他請一頓，就像要割他的肉一樣。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: What a cheapskate! Asking him to treat a meal is like asking him to cut his own flesh.

nan_sentence: 過年初二是查某囝日，嫁出去的查某囝攏會佇這工轉去後頭厝。
nan_tailo: Kuè-nî tshe-jī sī tsa-bóo-kiánn-ji̍t, kè--tshut-khì ê tsa-bóo-kiánn lóng ē tī tsit kang tńg-khì āu-thâu-tshù.
zh_xc: 大年初二是迎婿日，嫁出去的女兒都會在這一天回娘家。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The second day of the Lunar New Year is the day to welcome sons-in-law, daughters who have married will return to their parents' home on this day.
Don't wash off the persimmon frost on the persimmon cake.

nan_sentence: 六月天火燒埔，踮外口一時仔久隨流汗流洘。
nan_tailo: La̍k-gue̍h-thinn hué-sio-poo, tiàm guā-kháu tsi̍t-sî-á kú suî lâu-kuānn-lâu-khó.
zh_xc: 六月大熱天，在外面一下子馬上就汗流浹背。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's sweltering in June, and you immediately start sweating profusely as soon as you go outside.
Acting recklessly and unreasonably will not lead to a good end.

nan_tailo: Nā ū tāi-tsì,  hiann-tī ài sio-thīn.
zh_xc: 若出事情，兄弟要相互扶持。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If something happens, brothers should support each other.

nan_sentence: 親情有禮數相伨，較會親。
nan_tailo: Tshin-tsiânn ū lé-sòo sio-thīn，khah ē tshin.
zh_xc: 親戚之間能禮尚往來，才會比較親近。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Relatives can be closer to each other if they can exchange courtesies.

nan_sentence: 這軀衫仔褲，色水袂相伨。
nan_tailo: Tsit su sann-á-khòo sik-tsuí bē sann-thīn.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The color of this suit is hard to match.

nan_sentence: 伊搬走了後阮就毋捌相揣矣。
nan_tailo: I puann-tsáu liáu-āu guán tō m̄ bat sio-tshuē--ah.
zh_xc: 他搬走以後我們就不曾聯絡了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: After he moved away, we haven't been in contact.

nan_sentence: 好朋友結婚，你才包一千箍，袂看口得啦！
nan_tailo: Hó pîng-iú kiat-hun, lí tsiah pau tsi̍t-tshing khoo, bē khuànn-kháu--tit--lah!
zh_xc: 好朋友結婚，你才包一千塊，太難看了啦！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Your good friend is getting married and you only give a thousand dollars as a gift, that's too stingy!

nan_tailo: Khuànn-miā bô po, tsia̍h tsuí to bô.
zh_xc: 算命的如果不會恭維人幾句，就不會有顧客上門了，那麼他連喝水的錢都賺不到。俗語，比喻江湖術士之言不可盡信。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If a fortune teller does not flatter people a bit, they will not have any customers, and then they won't even earn the money to drink water. This is a proverb, implying that one should not completely trust the words of street performers or charlatans.

nan_sentence: 伊想欲騙我，毋過早就予我看破跤手矣。
nan_tailo: I siūnn-beh phiàn--guá，m̄-koh tsá tō hōo guá khuànn-phuà-kha-tshiú--ah.
zh_xc: 他想騙我，可是早就被我識破了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He wanted to deceive me, but I saw through him long ago.

nan_sentence: 人講：「食佇面裡，穿佇身裡」，穿插若傷凊彩，人看袂上目。
nan_tailo: Lâng kóng, "Tsia̍h tī bīn--lí, tshīng tī sin--lí", tshīng-tshah nā siunn tshìn-tshái, lâng khuànn-bē-tsiūnn-ba̍k.
zh_xc: 俗話說：「吃得好，自然臉色紅潤；穿得好，自然外表體面」，穿著打扮如果太隨便，人家看不上眼。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: As the saying goes, "Eat well, and naturally your complexion will be rosy; dress well, and naturally you will look presentable." If you dress too casually, people may not look upon you favorably.

nan_sentence: 伊遐爾好額，這種俗物伊看袂上目。
nan_tailo: I hiah-nī hó-gia̍h, tsit-tsióng sio̍k-mi̍h i khuànn-bē-tsiūnn-ba̍k.
zh_xc: 他那麼有錢，這種便宜東西是看不上眼的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is so rich that he wouldn't even glance at such cheap things.

nan_sentence: 伊有科學的才能，佇國小一年的時陣，就突顯出來矣。
nan_tailo: I ū kho-ha̍k ê tsâi-lîng, tī kok-sió it-nî ê sî-tsūn, tō tu̍t-hián--tshut-lâi--ah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has a talent for science, which became evident when he was in the first grade of elementary school.

nan_sentence: 我佮阮大姊攏相兔，伊足足大我一紀年。
nan_tailo: Guá kah guán tuā-tsí lóng siùnn thòo, i tsiok-tsiok tuā guá tsi̍t khí-nî.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: My older sister and I are both born in the year of the Rabbit, she is a full cycle older than me.

nan_sentence: 日出紅霞，水淋頭額；日落紅霞，曝死老爺。
nan_tailo: Ji̍t tshut âng-hê, tsuí lâm thâu-hia̍h; ji̍t lo̍h âng-hê, pha̍k-sí lāu-iâ.
zh_xc: 早晨出現紅霞，就會下雨；黃昏出現紅霞，烈日當空。這是民間流傳的氣象諺語。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If red clouds appear in the morning, it will rain; if red clouds appear at dusk, the sun will be scorching. This is a weather proverb passed down among the people.

nan_sentence: 電台節目咧推銷健康食品，定定講甲比美國仙丹閣較好用。
nan_tailo: Tiān-tâi tsiat-bo̍k teh thui-siau kiān-khong si̍t-phín, tiānn-tiānn kóng kah pí Bí-kok-sian-tan koh-khah hó-īng.
zh_xc: 電台節目在推銷健康食品，常常說得比靈丹妙藥還好用。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The radio program is promoting health food, often claiming it to be more effective than magic potions.

nan_sentence: 無彼个美國時間佮你咧捙盤。
nan_tailo: Bô hit ê bí-kok-sî-kan kah lí teh tshia-puânn.
zh_xc: 沒那個閒工夫和你折騰。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I don't have the spare time to mess around with you.

nan_sentence: 美國塗豆又閣叫做發財樹，人兜的盆栽定看會著。
nan_tailo: Bí-kok-thôo-tāu iū-koh kiò-tsò huat-tsâi-tshiū, lâng-tau ê phûn-tsai tiānn khuànn ē tio̍h.
zh_xc: 馬拉巴栗又叫做發財樹，人家家裡的盆栽常看得到。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The Malabar chestnut is also known as the money tree, which is often seen as a potted plant in people's homes.

nan_sentence: 我看這个人有帶背骨，你毋通傷信用伊。
nan_tailo: Guá khuànn tsit ê lâng ū tài puē-kut, lí m̄-thang siunn sìn-iōng--i.
zh_xc: 我看這個人生性容易背叛，你不要太信任他。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I see that this person is naturally prone to betrayal, you should not trust him too much.

zh_xc: 吃裡扒外，出賣自己人的叛徒
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A traitor who benefits from both sides and betrays his own people.

nan_sentence: 閣來這齣戲是苦齣，逐家手巾仔著愛攢予伊好。
nan_tailo: Koh lâi tsit tshut hì sī khóo-tshut, ta̍k-ke tshiú-kin-á tio̍h-ài tshuân hōo i hó.
zh_xc: 再來這齣戲是苦情戲，大家手帕要準備好。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The next act is a tragedy, everyone should prepare their handkerchiefs.

nan_sentence: 伊生成較懶性，若無較捷共迫促咧，工課進度會去予誤著。
nan_tailo: I senn-sîng khah nuā-sìng, nā bô khah tsia̍p kā pik-tshik--leh, khang-khuè tsìn-tōo ē khì hoō gōo--tio̍h.
zh_xc: 他生性比較懶散，如果不經常督促他，工作進度會被耽誤到。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is naturally quite lazy, if he is not constantly urged, his work progress will be delayed.

nan_sentence: 這件代誌較迫促，愛先處理。
nan_tailo: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì khah pik-tshik, ài sing tshú-lí.
zh_xc: 這件事情較急迫，要先處理。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This matter is more urgent and needs to be handled first.

nan_sentence: 城市愈來愈楦大，市郊嘛愈來愈鬧熱。
nan_tailo: Siânn-tshī jú lâi jú hùn-tuā, tshī-kau mā jú lâi jú lāu-jia̍t.
zh_xc: 城市愈來愈向外擴張，市郊也愈來愈熱鬧。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The city is expanding outward more and more, and the suburbs are also becoming increasingly lively.

nan_sentence: 歇睏日伊常在𤆬一家伙仔去郊外𨑨迌。
nan_tailo: Hioh-khùn-ji̍t i tshiâng-tsāi tshuā tsi̍t-ke-hué-á khì kau-guā tshit-thô.
zh_xc: 假日他經常帶領全家人去郊外遊玩。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He often takes his whole family to the outskirts for fun on holidays.

nan_sentence: 進前這條街仔有足濟米郊，人攏叫這條街仔米街。
nan_tailo: Tsìn-tsîng tsit tiâu ke-á ū tsiok tsē bí-kau, lâng lóng kiò tsit tiâu ke-á bí-ke.
zh_xc: 從前這條街道有很多米的批發店，人家都稱呼這條街道是米街。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In the past, this street had many rice wholesale stores, so people used to call this street Rice Street.

nan_sentence: 現代網路方便進步，有足濟人是佇面冊頂懸佮人相捌、盤撋。
nan_tailo: Hiān-tāi bāng-lōo hong-piān tsìn-pōo, ū tsiok tsē lâng sī tī Bīn-tsheh tíng-kuân kah lâng sio-bat, puânn-nuá.
zh_xc: 現代網路方便進步，有很多人在臉書上面跟人認識，培養感情。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The modern internet is convenient and advanced, many people get to know each other and cultivate relationships on Facebook.
A fierce-looking face

nan_sentence: 我看伊面腔無偌好，毋敢加講話。
nan_tailo: Guá khuànn i bīn-tshiunn bô guā hó, m̄ kánn ke kóng-uē.
zh_xc: 我看他面貌不太可親，不敢多話。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I find his appearance unfriendly, and dare not talk much.

nan_sentence: 原本會贏的比賽煞輸輸去，逐个人攏面漚面臭。
nan_tailo: Guân-pún ē iânn ê pí-sài suah su-su--khì, ta̍k ê lâng lóng bīn-àu-bīn-tshàu.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The game that was originally going to win was surprisingly lost, everyone's face looked very bad.
His face is very big.
He is very good at playing diabolo.

nan_sentence: 若毋是伊食人夠夠，逐家嘛袂佮伊計較。
nan_tailo: Nā m̄ sī i tsia̍h-lâng-kàu-kàu, ta̍k-ke mā bē kah i kè-kàu.
zh_xc: 要不是他欺人太甚，大家也不會跟他計較。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If he hadn't gone too far in bullying others, people wouldn't have picked a fight with him.

nan_sentence: 靠勢伊是大官虎，食人夠夠。
zh_xc: 仗著他是大官，魚肉百姓。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Relying on his high position, he exploits the common people.

nan_sentence: 伊做十一哥五十冬矣，這馬才想欲娶某，人講伊是食老出癖。
nan_tailo: I tsò tsa̍p-it-ko gōo-tsa̍p tang--ah, tsit-má tsiah siūnn-beh tshuā-bóo, lâng kóng i sī tsia̍h-lāu-tshut-phia̍h.
zh_xc: 他當了五十年的光棍，現在才想要結婚，人家說他是老了才出麻疹。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He was single for fifty years, and now he wants to get married. People say he is like getting measles when he's old.

nan_sentence: 你腰子無好，著比正常人食閣較汫，袂使像往過遐愛食重鹹。
nan_tailo: Lí io-tsí bô hó, tio̍h pí tsìng-siông-lâng tsia̍h koh-khah tsiánn, bē-sái tshiūnn íng-kuè hiah ài tsia̍h-tāng-kiâm.
zh_xc: 你腎臟不好，得比正常人吃得更清淡，不可再像以前那麼愛吃重口味的食物。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Your kidneys are not in good condition, you need to eat lighter than normal people, and you can no longer love to eat heavy-tasting foods like before.

nan_sentence: 彼箍食重鹹，工程過伊的手攏愛抽百分之十。
nan_tailo: Hit khoo tsia̍h-tāng-kiâm, kang-tîng kuè i ê tshiú lóng ài thiu pah hun tsi tsa̍p.
zh_xc: 那個人胃口大，工程讓他經手都要抽百分之十。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: That person has a big appetite, he takes a ten percent cut from every project he handles.

nan_sentence: 欲設風力發電機，就愛佇較食風的所在。
nan_tailo: Beh siat hong-li̍k huat-tiān-ki, tō ài tī khah tsia̍h-hong ê sóo-tsāi.
zh_xc: 要架設風力發電機，就得在比較受風處。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: To set up a wind turbine, it needs to be in a windier place.

nan_sentence: 一陣少年仔相招去海墘𨑨迌，干焦食風嘛暢甲！
nan_tailo: Tsi̍t tīn siàu-liân-á sio-tsio khì hái-kînn tshit-thô, kan-na tsia̍h-hong mā thiòng kah.
zh_xc: 一群小伙子相約去海邊遊玩，光是吹風也樂得很。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A group of young guys agreed to go to the beach for fun, and they were very happy just by the wind blowing.

nan_tailo: Tsia̍h-ping huah liâng, tsia̍h-tê huah sio.
zh_xc: 吃冰喊冷，喝茶喊燙。俗語，形容只顧自己享受，不管別人死活。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Eating ice and complaining it's cold, drinking tea and complaining it's hot. This is a proverb, describing those who only care about their own enjoyment, regardless of others' wellbeing.

nan_sentence: 廳堂專人客，男女數千个，喜酒食真濟，聽候閣食茶。
nan_tailo: Thiann-tn̂g tsuan lâng-kheh, lâm-lú sòo tshing ê, hí-tsiú tsia̍h tsin tsē, thìng-hāu koh tsia̍h-tê.
zh_xc: 大廳都是客人，男女好幾千個，酒席吃喝多了，等待再喝新娘茶。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The hall is full of guests, thousands of men and women. They have had plenty to eat and drink at the banquet, and are now waiting to drink the bride's tea.

nan_sentence: 犯法的人，隨時愛準備食罪。
nan_tailo: Huān-huat ê lâng, suî-sî ài tsún-pī tsia̍h-tsuē.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Criminals should always be prepared to confess and accept legal sanctions.

nan_tailo: Lāu-pē thiànn kiánn, thè kiánn tsia̍h-tsuē.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The father dearly loves his son, taking the blame for his son's wrongdoing.

nan_sentence: 代誌這馬出破矣，家己毋食認，閣硬欲賴予別人，實在無理。
nan_tailo: Tāi-tsì tsit-má tshut-phuà--ah, ka-kī m̄ tsia̍h-jīn, koh ngē-beh luā hōo pa̍t-lâng, si̍t-tsāi bô-lí.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Now that the truth is out, it's unreasonable to not take responsibility and instead try to blame others.
He is fierce and brutal, don't provoke him.

nan_sentence: 這个狗官啥物khoo-mí-sióng都敢提，真正是食銅食鐵食到a-lú-mih。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê káu-kuann siánn-mih khoo-mí-sióng to kánn the̍h, tsin-tsiànn sī tsia̍h-tâng-tsia̍h-thih tsia̍h kàu a-lú-mih.
zh_xc: 這個狗官什麼樣的回扣都敢拿，真的是吃人不吐骨頭。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This corrupt official dares to take any kind of kickback, really like a person who eats people without spitting out bones.

nan_sentence: 這擺請人客是欲辦桌，抑是欲去食餐廳？
nan_tailo: Tsit pái tshiánn lâng-kheh sī beh pān-toh, ia̍h-sī beh khì tsia̍h-tshan-thiann?

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Is this treat going to be a banquet, or are we going to a restaurant?

nan_sentence: 伊其實啥代誌攏袂曉，怙一支喙咧食聲爾爾。
nan_tailo: I kî-si̍t siánn tāi-tsì lóng bē-hiáu, kōo tsi̍t ki tshuì teh tsia̍h-siann niā-niā.
zh_xc: 他其實什麼事情都不會，單憑一張嘴虛張聲勢而已。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He actually doesn't know how to do anything, he's just bluffing with his words.

nan_sentence: 你講手指月娘會予月娘割耳仔，彼是欲騙囡仔的，我予你袂食聲得。
nan_tailo: Lí kóng tshiú kí gue̍h-niû ē hōo gue̍h-niû kuah hīnn-á, he sī beh phiàn gín-á--ê, guá hōo lí bē tsia̍h-siann--tit.
zh_xc: 你說手指月亮會被月亮割耳朵，那是要騙小孩的，你別想騙我。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You say the moon will cut the ears of the finger moon, that's to deceive children, don't think about deceiving me.

nan_sentence: 香櫞瓜佇阮庄跤捷有通食。
nan_tailo: Hiunn-înn-kue tī guán tsng-kha tsia̍p ū thang tsia̍h.
zh_xc: 佛手瓜在我們鄉下經常有得吃。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We often eat Buddha's hand squash in our countryside.

nan_sentence: 新聞有咧報，興食檳榔的人，若去食著倒吊子中毒，有時會無命。
nan_tailo: Sin-bûn ū teh pò, hìng tsia̍h pin-nn̂g ê lâng, nā khì tsia̍h-tio̍h tò-tiàu-tsí tiòng-to̍k, ū-sî ē bô miā.

nan_sentence: 犯人的手骨予刑警倒拗去尻脊後。
nan_tailo: Huān-lâng ê tshiú-kut hōo hîng-kíng tò-áu khì kha-tsiah-āu.
zh_xc: 犯人的手臂被刑警反折到背後。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The criminal's arm was twisted behind his back by the police.

zh_xc: 俗語，農曆每月十八日是潮汐漲到最高的時候，而十九日是潮汐開始退潮的日子。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In colloquial terms, the 18th day of each lunar month is when the tide rises to its highest, and the 19th day is when the tide begins to recede.

nan_sentence: 官司來到尾站，較輸面的使倒頭槌，提出新證據，勢面反輾轉，倒贏。
nan_tailo: Kuann-si lâi-kàu bué-tsām, khah su-bīn--ê sái tò-thâu-thuî, thê-tshut sin tsìng-kì, sè-bīn píng-liàn-tńg,  tò-iânn.
zh_xc: 官司來到尾聲，居劣勢的一方的使出回馬槍，提出新證據，局勢逆轉，反敗為勝。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The lawsuit is coming to an end, the disadvantaged party pulls out a last-minute trick, presenting new evidence, turning the situation around, and turning defeat into victory.

nan_sentence: 厝裡敲電話來，叫伊趕緊倒轉去。
nan_tailo: Tshù--lí khà tiān-uē lâi, kiò i kuánn-kín tò-tńg--khì.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Someone called from home, telling him to hurry back.

nan_sentence: 你過年敢有欲倒轉去南投？

nan_sentence: 這兩个證人所講的話真倚意。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The statements made by these two witnesses are very similar in meaning.

nan_sentence: 伊解說先生傳授的道理，攏講了有倚意。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He explained the principles taught by the teacher, all of which could be expressed close to the original meaning.

nan_sentence: 咱出外較無方便，若會當凊彩揣一个所在倚蹛就好矣。
nan_tailo: Lán tshut-guā khah bô hong-piān, nā ē-tàng tshìn-tshái tshuē tsi̍t ê sóo-tsāi uá-tuà tō hó--ah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's quite inconvenient for us to be out and about. If possible, it would be nice to just find a place to stay anywhere.

nan_tailo: Guá hōo i lîng-lik kah tsin thiám.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I was terribly abused by him.

zh_xc: 當乞丐，受不了狗欺凌。俗語，貧賤之人難逃環境壓迫，或比喻員工不堪雇主虐待。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Being a beggar, can't stand the bullying of dogs. In a proverb, poor people can't escape the oppression of their environment, or it is used metaphorically to describe employees who can't stand the abuse of their employers.

nan_sentence: 愈來愈濟人佇厝尾頂搭棚仔種花、種菜，會使遮日、看媠，閣有通食。
nan_tailo: Jú lâi jú tsē lâng tī tshù-bué-tíng tah pênn-á tsìng-hue, tsìng-tshài, ē-sái jia-ji̍t, khuànn-suí, koh ū thang tsia̍h.

nan_sentence: 厝場好不如肚腸好，墳地好不如心地好。
nan_tailo: Tshù-tiûnn hó put-jû tōo-tn̂g hó, phûn-tē hó put-jû sim-tē hó.
zh_xc: 房屋地點好不如心腸好，墳地風水好不如心地好。俗語，勸人應注重心地修養甚於屋宅祖墳的地理風水。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's better to have a kind heart than a good house location, and it's better to have a good heart than a good feng shui for a grave. This is a proverb, advising people to focus more on cultivating a good heart than on the geographical feng shui of their houses and ancestral graves.

nan_sentence: 這塊寶石經過規千年，猶閣保存了真原全，無一屑仔缺角。
nan_tailo: Tsit tè pó-tsio̍h king-kuè kui tshing nî, iáu-koh pó-tsûn liáu tsin guân-tsuân, bô tsi̍t-sut-á khih-kak.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This gemstone, after thousands of years, is still perfectly preserved without any damage.

nan_tailo: Lí ná-thang tsò hit khuán tāi-tsì!

nan_tailo: Piánn tsia̍h siunn kín, tsia̍h kah kénn-kui.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Eating cake too quickly, it got stuck in the throat.

nan_tailo: I gâu kóng thò-thâu-uē, lâng-iân bē bái.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is very good at making polite remarks, and he has quite good interpersonal relationships.

nan_tailo: I khah liū mā hia-ê thò-thâu-uē.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He always brings up those clichéd topics.
Grind rice to make rice cake for the New Year.
The proverb, money can make the ghost grind the mill.

nan_sentence: 咱著教囡仔，去便所了後，挩鍊仔著愛挩予好勢。
nan_tailo: Lán tio̍h kà gín-á, khì piān-sóo liáu-āu, thuah-liān-á tio̍h-ài thuah hōo hó-sè.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We need to teach children to zip up properly after using the restroom.

nan_sentence: 檢方挽瓜揫藤，將所有的嫌犯攏㨑著，才做一睏總共𪜶起訴。

zh_xc: 打翻人家的飯碗，比喻害人家丟了工作
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Overturning someone's rice bowl, metaphorically means causing someone to lose their job.

zh_xc: 打翻醋罈子，形容醋勁大發
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Knocking over the vinegar jar, describing a great outbreak of jealousy.

nan_sentence: 人民捙倒獨裁者的銅像。

nan_sentence: 你做這个架仔傷料小，物件囥濟囥重就會崩去。
nan_tailo: Lí tsò tsit-ê kè-á siunn liāu-siáu, mi̍h-kiānn khǹg-tsē khǹg-tāng tō ē pang--khì.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The shelf you made is too thin, it will collapse if too many things are placed on it or if something heavy is put on it.

nan_sentence: 送彼做禮物傷料小，恐驚無夠看。
nan_tailo: Sàng he tsò lé-bu̍t siunn liāu-siáu, khióng-kiann bô-kàu-khuànn.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Giving that as a gift is too inconspicuous, I'm afraid it's not impressive enough.

nan_tailo: Tsit tè tshâ ū tsi̍t ê tshâ-ba̍k.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This piece of wood has a knot.

nan_sentence: 歹勢，我較柴目，袂記得咱是啥人，咱敢有相捌？

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I'm sorry, my memory fails me, I don't remember who you are. Do we know each other?

nan_sentence: 大柴鋸做柴箍較好燃火。

nan_sentence: 欲去予人請食喜酒，嘛著梳妝打扮一下。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you're going to treat people to a wedding banquet, you should dress up a bit.

nan_sentence: 拄著歹人客來咧花，咱雖然氣暢忍，嘛著好禮仔共伊安搭。
nan_tailo: Tú-tio̍h pháinn-lâng-kheh lâi teh hue, lán sui-jiân khì-thiòng-lún, mā tio̍h hó-lé-á kā i an-tah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When dealing with a difficult customer who comes to find fault, although we are full of anger, we still need to appease him properly.

nan_sentence: 見擺落大雨，阮遮的溝仔水就消敨袂離。
nan_tailo: Kiàn-pái lo̍h tuā-hōo, guán tsia ê kau-á-tsuí tō siau-tháu bē lī.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Every time it rains heavily, the water in our gutters here can't drain fast enough.

nan_sentence: 窗仔門關甲密喌喌，萬一gá-suh洩漏，消敨袂出去，彼就危險矣！
nan_tailo: Thang-á-mn̂g kuainn kah ba̍t-tsiuh-tsiuh, bān-it gá-suh sia̍p-lāu, siau-tháu bē tshut--khì, he tō guî-hiám--ah!
zh_xc: 窗戶關得緊緊的，萬一瓦斯洩漏，無法流出室外，那可危險了！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The windows are tightly closed. If there is a gas leak, it can't escape to the outside, which could be dangerous!
Relieve depression

nan_sentence: 逐工上班屈牢牢，趁歇睏日出去𬦰山，消敨一下。
nan_tailo: Ta̍k-kang siōng-pan khut-tiâu-tiâu, thàn hioh-khùn-ji̍t tshut-khì peh-suann, siau-tháu--tsi̍t-ē.

nan_sentence: 烏子仔菜除了做野菜以外，伊結的果到分變烏了後，嘛是阮的四秀仔。
nan_tailo: Oo-tsí-á-tshài tû-liáu tsò iá-tshài í-guā, i kiat ê kó kàu-hun piàn oo liáu-āu, mā sī guán ê sì-siù-á.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In addition to being a wild vegetable, the fruit of the dragon okra turns black when ripe and also serves as our snack.

nan_sentence: 臺北人講烏白切，嘉義人講滷熟肉。
nan_tailo: Tâi-pak-lâng kóng oo-pe̍h-tshiat, Ka-gī-lâng kóng lóo-sio̍k-bah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: People in Taipei say "black and white cut", people in Chiayi say "stewed cooked meat".

zh_xc: 俗語，當令便宜的新鮮漁獲比不當令的高級漁貨好吃。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In common parlance, fresh seasonal fish is tastier than off-season high-end seafood.

nan_sentence: 「烏面賊，拍袂死，埋袂密。」予你臆一款自然現象。
nan_tailo: Oo-bīn-tsha̍t, phah bē sí, tâi bē ba̍t.  Hōo lí ioh tsi̍t khuán tsū-jiân hiān-siōng.
