english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Riddle: A black-faced thief, can't be killed, can't be buried. Can you guess a natural phenomenon? The answer is a shadow.

nan_sentence: 人參是烏面賊，咱無內行，若拄著生份人來推銷，毋通買。
nan_tailo: Jîn-sim sī oo-bīn-tsha̍t, lán bô lāi-hâng, nā tú-tio̍h senn-hūn-lâng lâi thui-siau, m̄-thang bé.
zh_xc: 人蔘是真假、價值難斷之物，咱們不內行，若遇到陌生人來推銷，不要買。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Ginseng is something whose authenticity and value are hard to determine. We are not experts, so if a stranger comes to sell it, do not buy it.

nan_tailo: Tsit-ki thih-á, kha̍h tsi̍t iân oo-sian.
zh_xc: 這枝鐵條，卡了一層黑鏽。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This iron rod is covered with a layer of black rust.

nan_sentence: 這支茶罐看著烏鉎烏鉎，泡出來的茶煞真好啉。
nan_tailo: Tsit ki tê-kuàn khuànn tio̍h oo-sian-oo-sian, phàu--tshut-lâi ê tê suah tsin hó lim.
zh_xc: 這支茶壺看起來黑黑髒髒的，泡出來的茶卻很好喝。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This teapot looks black and dirty, but the tea it brews is very tasty.

nan_sentence: 三年前破病了後，煞留一个病母。
nan_tailo: Sann nî tsîng phuà-pēnn liáu-āu, suah lâu tsi̍t ê pēnn-bó.
zh_xc: 三年前生病以後，竟留下了一個病根。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: After falling ill three years ago, a root of the disease was surprisingly left behind.

zh_xc: 妊娠初期，多感寒氣，比較怕冷，接近產期時，比較怕熱。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In the early stages of pregnancy, one often feels cold and is more sensitive to cold. As the due date approaches, one tends to feel hotter.

nan_sentence: 上車進前半點鐘上好先食一粒眩車丹就較袂眩車。
nan_tailo: Tsiūnn-tshia tsìn-tsîng puànn tiám-tsing siōng-hó sing tsia̍h tsi̍t lia̍p hîn-tshia-tan tō khah bē hîn-tshia.
zh_xc: 上車前半個小時最好先服用一顆暈車藥就比較不會暈車了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's best to take a motion sickness pill half an hour before getting on the car to prevent car sickness.

nan_sentence: 講伊是留美的博士，偌𠢕拄偌𠢕，予人黜一下隨破功。
nan_tailo: Kóng i sī liû-Bí ê phok-sū, guā gâu tú guā gâu, hōo lâng thuh tsi̍t-ē suî phò-kong.
zh_xc: 說他是留美的博士，多厲害又多厲害，被人一駁斥，立即露出馬腳。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: They say he is a Ph.D. who studied in the U.S., so impressive and so formidable, but once someone refutes him, he immediately shows his true colors.

nan_sentence: 伊生做斯文斯文，真有內涵的款，毋過一下開喙就破功矣。
nan_tailo: I senn-tsò su-bûn-su-bûn, tsin ū luē-hâm ê khuán, m̄-koh tsi̍t-ē khui-tshuì tō phò-kong--ah.
zh_xc: 他長得挺斯文，很有內涵的樣子，不過一開口就原形畢露了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He looks quite refined and seems to have depth, but his true colors show as soon as he opens his mouth.

nan_sentence: 予史豔文的純陽掌拍著，一甲子的修煉現破功。
nan_tailo: Hōo Sú Iām-bûn ê Sûn-iâng-tsiáng phah--tio̍h, tsi̍t kah-tsí ê siu-liān hiān phò-kong.
zh_xc: 被史豔文的純陽掌打中，一甲子的修煉馬上破功。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Hit by Shi Yanwen's Pure Yang Palm, a cycle of sixty years of cultivation was immediately ruined.

nan_sentence: 咱誠久無見面矣，有閒就加減來阮兜坐坐咧，罔破豆一下啦。
nan_tailo: Lán tsiânn kú bô kìnn-bīn--ah, ū-îng tō ke-kiám lâi guán tau tsē-tsē--leh, bóng phò-tāu--tsi̍t-ē--lah.
zh_xc: 我們很久沒見面了，有空就多少來我家坐坐，稍作閒聊一下。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: We haven't seen each other for a long time. If you have time, come to my house and sit for a while, and we can have a casual chat.

nan_sentence: 較早定定聽會著人喝欲補破鼎，這馬攏聽袂著矣。
nan_tailo: Khah-tsá tiānn-tiānn thiann ē tio̍h lâng huah beh póo phuà-tiánn, tsit-má lóng thiann bē tio̍h--ah.
zh_xc: 早年常常聽得到有人呼喊著要不要補破鍋子，現在都聽不到了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In the past, it was common to hear people shouting about whether or not to mend broken pots, but now it's no longer heard.

nan_sentence: 伊運動傷過激烈，無細膩煞破鼎去。
nan_tailo: I ūn-tōng siunn-kuè kik-lia̍t, bô-sè-jī suah phuà-tiánn--khì.
zh_xc: 她運動太過激烈，不小心竟陰部出血。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: She exercised too vigorously and accidentally caused bleeding in her private area.

nan_sentence: 王家兄弟為著祖公仔產冤家相告。
nan_tailo: Ông--ka hiann-tī uī tio̍h tsóo-kong-á-sán uan-ke sio-kò.
zh_xc: 王家兄弟為了祖產爭吵、打官司。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The Wang brothers are arguing and suing over the ancestral property.

nan_sentence: 這个嬰仔好育飼，閣不時笑微微，古錐甲！
nan_tailo: Tsit ê enn-á hó io-tshī, koh put-sî tshiò-bi-bi, kóo-tsui kah!
zh_xc: 這個嬰孩易養育，又常常笑瞇瞇的，好可愛！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This baby is easy to raise, often smiling, so cute!

nan_sentence: 伊真𠢕搬笑詼齣，毋過伊平常時罕得講耍笑。
nan_tailo: I tsin gâu puann tshiò-khue-tshut, m̄-koh i pîng-siông-sî hán-tit kóng-sńg-tshiò.
zh_xc: 他擅於演爆笑劇，但是他平時不苟言笑。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is good at acting in comedy, but he is usually not talkative or humorous.

nan_sentence: 你等咧出去，愛會記得去便利商店納錢喔！
nan_tailo: Lí tán--leh tshut--khì, ài ē-kì-tit khì piān-lī siong-tiàm la̍p-tsînn--ooh.
zh_xc: 你待會兒出去，要記得去便利商店繳費喔！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When you go out later, remember to pay the bill at the convenience store!

nan_sentence: 欲買的衫揀好矣未？我欲來去納錢矣喔！
nan_tailo: Beh bé ê sann kíng hó--ah--buē? Guá beh lâi-khì la̍p-tsînn--ah--ooh!
zh_xc: 要買的衣服挑好了沒？我要去結帳了哦！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Have you picked out the clothes you want to buy? I'm going to check out now!

zh_xc: 收存漁網的小屋被火燒了，網子就燒掉了，所以說「無網」，諧音「無望」，表示毫無希望。這是一句歇後語。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The hut where the fishing nets were stored was burned down, and the nets were burned up, hence the phrase "no net", which sounds like "no hope", indicating utter hopelessness. This is a Chinese idiom.

nan_sentence: 遮的香油囥傷久，鼻著臭油餲臭油餲。
nan_tailo: Tsia ê hiang-iû khǹg siunn kú, phīnn tio̍h tshàu-iû-ai tshàu-iû-ai.
zh_xc: 這些香油存放太久了，聞起來有不新鮮的異味。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: These sesame oils have been stored for too long and they smell stale.

nan_sentence: 人生茫茫渺渺，毋知影對佗位來，嘛毋知影對佗位去。
nan_tailo: Jîn-sing bông-bông-biáu-biáu, m̄ tsai-iánn tuì tó-uī lâi, mā m̄ tsai-iánn tuì tó-uī khì.
zh_xc: 人生很難預料、掌握，不知從哪裡來，也不知往哪裡去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Life is hard to predict and control, not knowing where it comes from and where it goes.
Welcome the guests with tea.

nan_sentence: 伊泡茶，著用茶洗洗茶甌，有夠工夫。
nan_tailo: I phàu-tê, tio̍h īng tê-sé sé tê-au, ū-kàu kang-hu.
zh_xc: 他泡茶，得用洗茶杯的大碗洗茶杯，非常講究。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He brews tea, and uses a large bowl specifically for washing tea cups, he is very particular about it.

nan_sentence: 手捾茶籗六角扁，緊緊捾來身軀邊。
nan_tailo: Tshiú kuānn tê-khah la̍k kak pínn, kín-kín kuānn lâi sin-khu-pinn.
zh_xc: 手提六角扁扁的茶籃，趕快提來到身邊。這是一首採茶四句聯，整首為「手捾茶籗六角扁，緊緊捾來身軀邊，挽到過晝挽袂滇，就喊阿君你挽來添。」
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Carry the hexagonal flat tea basket quickly to your side. This is a quatrain about picking tea, the whole poem is "Hold the hexagonal flat tea basket in hand, tightly hold it to your body, pick until the day is over without lingering, then call out for you to pick more."
Sow grass seeds

nan_sentence: 啊阮都草地倯，毋才袂曉坐捷運！
nan_tailo: Ah guán to tsháu-tē-sông, m̄-tsiah bē-hiáu tsē tsia̍t-ūn!
zh_xc: 因為我是土包子，才不會搭捷運啊！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Because I'm a country bumpkin, I don't know how to take the subway!

nan_sentence: 荏身命的人較快感著，早暗著注意疊衫。
nan_tailo: Lám-sin-miā ê lâng khah khuài kám--tio̍h, tsá-àm tio̍h tsù-ì tha̍h-sann.
zh_xc: 體質虛弱的人較容易傷風感冒，早晚得注意添加衣服。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: People with weak constitutions are more prone to catching colds, so they should pay attention to adding clothing in the morning and evening.

nan_sentence: 因為時間袂拄好，我才無去聽伊演講。
nan_tailo: In-uī sî-kan bē-tú-hó, guá tsiah bô khì thiann i ián-káng.
zh_xc: 因為時間不湊巧，我才沒去聽他演講。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Because the timing was inconvenient, I didn't go to listen to his lecture.

nan_sentence: 景氣真䆀，我手頭袂拄好，你遐敢有冗？先共你壘一寡。
nan_tailo: Kíng-khì tsin bái, guá tshiú-thâu bē-tú-hó, lí hia kám ū liōng? Sing kā lí luí--tsi̍t-kuá.
zh_xc: 景氣很差，我手頭不方便，你那裡還有餘裕嗎？先跟你暫借一點。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The economy is really bad, I'm short on cash, do you have any surplus over there? I need to borrow some from you for now.

nan_sentence: 毋知這个嬰仔是佗位仔咧袂拄好，騙攏袂恬。
nan_tailo: M̄-tsai tsit ê enn-á sī tó-uī-á teh bē-tú-hó, phiàn lóng bē tiām.
zh_xc: 不知這個嬰孩到底是哪裡不舒服，怎麼安撫還是哭鬧不停。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I don't know what's wrong with this baby, no matter how I soothe it, it just keeps crying.
Doing it this way won't work.

zh_xc: 朽木做不成器具。引申指庸材才不堪造就。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A rotten wood cannot be carved into a tool. This is metaphorically referring to mediocre talents that are hard to cultivate.

nan_sentence: 定定來共恁攪擾，我感覺對恁真袂做得。
nan_tailo: Tiānn-tiānn lâi kā lín kiáu-jiáu, guá kám-kak tuì lín tsin bē-tsò--tit.
zh_xc: 常常來打擾您，我覺得對你們很過意不去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I often bother you, I feel very sorry for you.

zh_xc: 你看了不以為然，是不是？
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You don't seem convinced, do you?

nan_sentence: 袂曉就講袂曉，毋通袂博假博。
nan_tailo: Bē-hiáu tō kóng bē-hiáu, m̄-thang bē-phok-ké-phok.
zh_xc: 不會就說不會，不要不懂裝懂。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you don't know, just say you don't know, don't pretend to understand when you don't.

zh_xc: 豆腐和石頭──碰不得。這是一句歇後語。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Tofu and stone - cannot touch. This is a Chinese idiom.

nan_sentence: 伊看著查某囡仔，就欲佮人膏膏纏，莫怪予人罵伊袂曉衰。
nan_tailo: I khuànn-tio̍h tsa-bóo-gín-á, tō beh kah lâng ko-ko-tînn, bo̍k-kuài hōo lâng mē i bē-hiáu-sue.
zh_xc: 他看到年輕女子，就要跟人糾纏，難怪被人罵他不知羞恥。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He sees a young woman and starts to pester her, no wonder people scold him for having no shame.

nan_sentence: 團體生活，各人的用品著做記認，才袂提毋著去。
nan_tailo: Thuân-thé sing-ua̍h, kok-lâng ê iōng-phín tio̍h tsò kì-jīn, tsiah bē the̍h m̄-tio̍h--khì.
zh_xc: 團體生活，各人的用品得做記號，才不會拿錯了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In communal living, everyone's belongings must be marked to avoid taking the wrong ones.

nan_sentence: 看著警察，彼陣毋成囡仔隨起豹飆，走甲無看見影。
nan_tailo: Khuànn-tio̍h kíng-tshat, hit tīn m̄-tsiânn-gín-á suî khí-pà-pio, tsáu kah bô khuànn-kìnn iánn.
zh_xc: 看到警察，那群小混混隨即拔腿逃跑，不見蹤影了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Upon seeing the police, the gang of hoodlums immediately took off running, disappearing without a trace.

nan_sentence: 伊酒癖䆀，酒啉啉咧定定起酒痟。
nan_tailo: I tsiú-phiah bái, tsiú lim-lim--leh tiānn-tiānn khí-tsiú-siáu.
zh_xc: 他酒品不佳，酒喝一喝經常發酒瘋。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His tolerance for alcohol is poor, he often gets drunk after a few drinks.

nan_sentence: 對火車頭出去，直行就迵海矣。
nan_tailo: Tuì hué-tshia-thâu tshut--khì, ti̍t-kiânn tō thàng-hái--ah.
zh_xc: 從火車站出去，直走就通往海濱了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Exit the train station, go straight and it leads to the seaside.

nan_sentence: 彼間新開的海產店，麥仔酒予你啉迵海的。
nan_tailo: Hit king sin khui ê hái-sán-tiàm, be̍h-á-tsiú hōo lí lim thàng-hái--ê.
zh_xc: 那間新開的海產店，啤酒類無限量供應你喝。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: That newly opened seafood restaurant offers unlimited beer for you to drink.

nan_sentence: 荔枝這陣退時矣，較無水分，也較袂甜。
nan_tailo: Nāi-tsi tsit-tsūn thè-sî--ah, khah bô tsuí-hun, iā khah bē tinn.
zh_xc: 荔枝現在已經過了盛產期，水份較少，也比較不甜。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The peak season for lychees has passed, they now have less moisture and are not as sweet.

zh_xc: 這套洋裝已經退流行了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This dress is already out of fashion.

nan_sentence: 馬花糋是用麵粉做的閣糋過的物件，毋通食傷濟。
nan_tailo: Bé-hue-tsìnn sī iōng mī-hún tsò--ê koh tsìnn--kuè ê mi̍h-kiānn, m̄-thang tsia̍h siunn tsē.
zh_xc: 兩相好是用麵粉做的又油炸過的東西，別吃太多。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Liǎngxiāng hǎo is something made from flour and then deep-fried, don't eat too much.

nan_sentence: 逐家較鬥搭咧，緊做予煞。
nan_tailo: Ta̍k-ke khah tàu-tah--leh, kín tsò hōo suah.
zh_xc: 大家好好配合，趕快做完。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Everyone cooperate well and finish quickly.

nan_sentence: 逐家鬥陣做工課，著較鬥搭咧，才會緊氣。
nan_tailo: Ta̍k-ke tàu-tīn tsò khang-khuè, tio̍h khah tàu-tah--leh, tsiah ē kín-khuì.
zh_xc: 大家一起工作，要步調一致些，才會迅速。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Everyone should work together and keep pace with each other in order to be efficient.

nan_sentence: 婚禮愛用紅布，氣氛才會鬥搭。
nan_tailo: Hun-lé ài īng âng-pòo, khì-hun tsiah ē tàu-tah.
zh_xc: 婚禮要用紅布，氣氛才會相稱。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The wedding needs to use red cloth, only then will the atmosphere be fitting.

nan_sentence: 菝仔有夠分無，共伊㨂甲一下就知。
nan_tailo: Pa̍t-á ū kàu-hun--bô, kā i tàng-kah--tsi̍t-ē tō tsai.
zh_xc: 番石榴熟了沒，用指甲刺探看看就知道。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Is the pomegranate ripe yet? You can find out by probing it with your fingernail.
How long has it been since you last came?
How long will it take to fix it?

nan_sentence: 雞母欲生卵的時，咱先提一粒卵囥踮一跡做囮，伊就會過來生蹛遐。
nan_tailo: Ke-bú beh senn-nn̄g ê sî, lán sing the̍h tsi̍t lia̍p nn̄g khǹg tiàm tsi̍t jiah tsò-buê, i tō ē kuè-lâi senn tuà hia.
zh_xc: 母雞要生蛋時，咱們先拿一顆蛋放在一處做誘餌，牠就會過來生在那兒。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When the hen is about to lay eggs, we first take an egg and place it somewhere as bait, and she will come to lay there.

nan_sentence: 金光黨一个做囮，假做有錢的戇囝，一个就鼓舞受害者去佮伊換錢。
nan_tailo: Kim-kong-tóng tsi̍t ê tsò-buê, ké-tsò ū-tsînn-ê gōng-kiánn, tsi̍t ê tō kóo-bú siū-hāi-tsiá khì kah i uānn-tsînn.
zh_xc: 詐騙集團一人當誘餌，裝成有錢的傻子，另一人就鼓動受害者去跟他換錢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: One person in the fraud group acts as bait, pretending to be a rich fool, while another person encourages the victim to exchange money with him.

nan_sentence: 伊會做竅害人，結局家己無好尾。
nan_tailo: I ē tsò-khiò hāi--lâng, kiat-kio̍k ka-kī bô hó-bué.
zh_xc: 他會用巫術害人，最後自己不得善終。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He harms people with witchcraft, and in the end, he does not meet a good fate.

nan_sentence: 教會佇老母日攏會準備剪絨仔花，予會友結佇胸前。
nan_tailo: Kàu-huē tī Lāu-bú-ji̍t lóng ē tsún-pī tsián-jiông-á-hue, hōo huē-iú kat tī hing-tsîng.
zh_xc: 教會在母親節都會準備康乃馨，讓會友別在胸前。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The church prepares carnations for Mother's Day, allowing congregants to pin them on their chests.

nan_sentence: 我有三本古冊予剪蟲咬甲烌烌去。
nan_tailo: Guá ū sann pún kóo-tsheh hōo tsián-thâng kā kah hu-hu--khì.
zh_xc: 我有三本古書被衣魚咬到腐化得粉碎了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Three of my ancient books have been gnawed and decayed to pieces by silverfish.
His macrocephaly is really obvious.

nan_sentence: 往過的人晏報戶口是誠四常的代誌。

nan_sentence: 無彩伊家財萬貫，煞顛倒寒酸，一箍銀都毋肯寄付。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He unexpectedly owns a fortune, yet he is miserly, not willing to donate even a single dollar.

nan_tailo: I ok-lâng bô-tánn, lí bián kiann--i.

nan_sentence: 彼个頭家蓋惡質，工廠刁工放予倒，家己走去外國享受。

nan_sentence: 醫生理解𪜶的掛慮，徛佇同情的立場，答應共𪜶提囡仔。

Is he a teacher?

nan_sentence: 伊敢是有啥物不得已的苦衷，才會做出這種代誌。

nan_sentence: 伊做人欺貧重富，佇庄仔頭名聲誠䆀。

nan_sentence: 毋通閣躊躇矣，殘殘共決落去！

nan_tailo: Han-tsî gâu thuànn-kin, tsin hó tsìng.

nan_tailo: Gû-tshia sái ji̍p làm-thôo, sái bē kiânn.

nan_tailo: Iô lâng bô-tsâi, iô ti bô thâi.

nan_sentence: 無大條番薯通炰，炰番薯仔囝嘛好。

nan_sentence: 伊睏癖真䆀，規暝反來反去。

nan_sentence: 人硩番薯拋過溝，咱硩番薯毋落頭。

nan_sentence: 代誌明明都伊做的，伊硬拗講是別人。

nan_sentence: 伊買彩券著獎，同事攏叫伊愛請。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He won the lottery with the ticket he bought, and his colleagues all asked him to treat them.

nan_tailo: Bé sì kha, ū-sî iā ē tio̍h-tak.

nan_sentence: 𪜶頭家若較歹咧，伊就較覕鬚。

nan_tailo: Gí-giân ê sû-luī siau-sit jú tsē, tsit ê gí-giân tō jú kín sí--khì.

nan_sentence: 買手閣加疊一成，就成交矣。

nan_sentence: 有一寡政治人物，干焦佇選舉的時，才較捷講母語來佮民眾跋感情。

nan_sentence: 恁欲跙流籠，著愛照排列，按呢才有公平。

nan_sentence: 伊真鈍目，看物件攏看袂清楚。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: His vision is poor, he can't see things clearly.

nan_sentence: 伊實在足鈍目，看過就隨袂記得。
nan_tailo: I si̍t-tsāi tsiok tūn-ba̍k, khuànn--kuè tō suî bē-kì--tit.
zh_xc: 他實在眼拙，看過就馬上忘了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He really has poor memory, he forgets as soon as he sees something.

nan_sentence: 這是阮的代誌，免你閒煩。
nan_tailo: Tse sī guán ê tāi-tsì, bián lí îng-huân.
zh_xc: 這是我們的事情，不用你瞎操心。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This is our business, you don't need to worry about it unnecessarily.

nan_sentence: 杜蚓仔真韌命，伊的後半段若斷去，家己會閣生出來。
nan_tailo: Tōo-kún-á tsin jūn-miā, i ê āu-puànn-tuānn nā tn̄g--khì, ka-kī ē koh senn--tshut-lâi.
zh_xc: 蚯蚓生命力很強，它的後半段要是斷了，自己會再生。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The earthworm has a strong vitality. If its latter half is broken, it will regenerate itself.

nan_sentence: 阿公真韌命，細漢的時拄著幾若擺空襲攏無代誌。
nan_tailo: A-kong tsin jūn-miā, sè-hàn ê sî tú-tio̍h kuí nā pái khong-si̍p lóng bô tāi-tsì.
zh_xc: 爺爺生命力很強，小時候遇到好幾次空襲都沒事。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Grandpa is very strong, he survived several air raids when he was young.

zh_xc: 祝你一路順風，有空要再來喔！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Wish you a smooth journey, come back when you have time!

nan_sentence: 黃目子會使用來做雪文。

nan_sentence: 𬦰懸崎，車著愛催油才𬦰會起去。
nan_tailo: Peh kuân-kiā, tshia tio̍h-ài tshui-iû tsiah peh ē khí--khì.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: To climb a steep slope, the car must accelerate by stepping on the gas pedal to get up.

zh_xc: 拾取刨木花回來當火媒。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Pick up the wood shavings to use as fire starter.

nan_sentence: 見若做風颱、落大雨，就有塗石流造成災害。
nan_tailo: Kiàn-nā tsò hong-thai, lo̍h tuā-hōo, tō ū thôo-tsio̍h-lâu tsō-sîng tsai-hāi.
zh_xc: 只要刮颱風、下大雨，就有土石流造成災害。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Whenever there are typhoons or heavy rain, there are landslides causing disasters.

nan_sentence: 嘉南平原的塗肉厚，足好種作。
nan_tailo: Ka-lâm Pîng-guân ê thôo-bah kāu, tsiok hó tsìng-tsoh.
zh_xc: 嘉南平原的表土層很厚，很適合耕作。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The topsoil layer of the Jianan Plain is very thick, making it suitable for cultivation.
The topsoil is fertile.
The surface soil is infertile.

zh_xc: 民間傳說保生大帝曾向媽祖求婚，但是媽祖一心掛念人民，拒絕了大帝的美意。大帝非常失望，也很生氣，就在農曆三月二十三日媽祖誕辰繞境時，施法術、降大雨。到了翌年三月十五日大帝誕辰遶境時，媽祖就颳起大風。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: According to folklore, Emperor Baosheng once proposed to Mazu, but Mazu, who cared deeply for the people, rejected the emperor's affection. The emperor was very disappointed and angry, so on the lunar calendar March 23rd, during Mazu's birthday procession, he used magic to bring about heavy rain. However, on the following year's March 15th, during the emperor's birthday procession, Mazu caused a strong wind to blow.

nan_sentence: 逐家攏叫厝主「媽祖婆」，有伊佇咧，絕對袂枵著！
nan_tailo: Ta̍k-ke lóng kiò tshù-tsú  "má-tsóo-pô", ū i tī--leh, tsua̍t-tuì bē iau--tio̍h!
zh_xc: 大家都叫房東「媽祖婆」，有她在，絕對不會挨餓！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Everyone calls the landlord "Mazu Po". With her around, no one will ever go hungry!

nan_sentence: 阿爸幌頭表示無同意這件代誌。

nan_sentence: 阿虎足愛上台唱歌，毋過逐家聽了攏幌頭。

nan_sentence: 伊毋是無才情才做袂成，是有人咧共伊搝後跤。

nan_sentence: 伊驚一趒，那搭胸坎，那問講是按怎樣。

nan_sentence: 這間海產店就是搵料咧出名啦！

nan_tailo: Hōo thuî-á hmh--tio̍h, ē tio̍h lāi-siong.

nan_sentence: 伊當咧大，一頓摁著三四碗飯。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is growing, eating three to four bowls of rice per meal.

nan_sentence: 我細漢的時，序大人有教我用母語暗唸三字經。

nan_sentence: 這幾年，一寡大公司攏時行舉辦尾牙的暗會。

nan_sentence: 這條巷仔看都細細狹狹，二十噸的拖車竟然駛會得過。
nan_tailo: Tsit tiâu hāng-á khuànn to sè-sè e̍h-e̍h, jī-tsa̍p-tòng ê thua-tshia kìng-jiân sái ē-tit-kuè.

nan_sentence: 伊一个查某人飼兩个囡仔，雖然艱苦，生活猶會得過。

nan_sentence: 這佇音韻學上完全解說會得過。

nan_sentence: 你按呢對待伊，你的心肝敢會得過？

nan_sentence: 我啉咖啡，一工極加兩杯。

nan_sentence: 蠓仔會傳播疾病，毋通想講予蠓叮著，極加是足癢爾爾。
nan_tailo: Báng-á ē thuân-pòo tsi̍t-pēnn, m̄-thang siūnn-kóng hōo báng tìng--tio̍h, ki̍k-ke sī tsiok tsiūnn niā-niā.

nan_sentence: 樹仔跤有真濟過路人來歇涼。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: There are many passersby taking a rest under the tree.

nan_sentence: 歇睏日毋免上班，你按算欲去佗位𨑨迌？

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You don't have to work on holidays, where do you plan to go for fun?

nan_tailo: Hioh-khùn-sî-á i siōng ài khì peh-suann.
zh_xc: 假日時他最喜歡去爬山。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He likes to go mountain climbing the most during holidays.

nan_sentence: 過去的代誌就按呢準拄煞。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Let bygones be bygones.

nan_sentence: 你欲來就來，毋來準拄煞。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If you want to come, then come. If not, just forget it.

nan_sentence: 伊食人夠夠，欠人兩萬箍，干焦還人萬五就欲準拄煞。
nan_tailo: I tsia̍h-lâng-kàu-kàu, khiàm lâng nn̄g-bān khoo, kan-na hîng lâng bān-gōo tō beh tsún-tú-suah.

nan_sentence: 討功勞的時伊搶做前，欲做苦工的時就溜旋。

nan_sentence: 我看著煎粿，一定會叫一盤來食。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The calf accidentally touched the exhaust pipe and got burned.

nan_sentence: 佇遠遠的所在，就看會著臺中火力發電廠彼四支煙筒管矣。
nan_tailo: Tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê sóo-tsāi, tō khuànn ē tio̍h Tâi-tiong hué-li̍k huat-tiān-tshiúnn hit sì ki ian-tâng-kóng--ah.
zh_xc: 在遠遠的地方，就看得到臺中火力發電廠那四根煙囪了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In the far distance, you can see the four chimneys of the Taichung Thermal Power Plant.

nan_sentence: 小可仔代誌逐家煞煞去，莫閣冤矣。
nan_tailo: Sió-khuá-á tāi-tsì ta̍k-ke suah-suah--khì, mài koh uan--ah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Let's just let this little matter go, and stop arguing.
He is short.
He is short and stout.

nan_sentence: 禁尿是傷身體的歹習慣，會引起腰子病。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Holding in urine is a harmful habit that can lead to kidney disease.

nan_sentence: 我毋捌向咧揉塗跤，揉無一時仔就腰痠背疼。

nan_tailo: In nn̄g-ê sī kâng pak-tn̂g senn--ê.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: They are both born from the same mother.

nan_tailo: I pak-tn̂g khuah, bē kah lâng kè-kàu.

nan_tailo: Tsínn-ke bô nn̄g, tsínn-kiánn bô pak-tn̂g.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The chick cannot lay eggs yet, the child is innocent and naive, straightforward in thoughts, without any cunning.
Falling into a deep abyss.

nan_sentence: 功夫是萬丈深坑，一世人嘛學袂透。

nan_tailo: Tsia̍h-lāu mā tio̍h khiām kuá tsînn-gîn, bān-put-hīng nā phuà-pēnn, tsiah ū thang khi hōo i-sing khuànn.

nan_sentence: 欲落山著冗早，若開始罩雺，看袂著路就危險。

nan_sentence: 大貨車敢會當入去巷仔底落貨？

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Can a large truck enter the alley to unload goods?

nan_sentence: 我規塊歌攏唱甲誠好，結果上尾句煞必叉，有夠落漆！

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I sang the whole song really well, but I cracked on the last note, it was such a letdown!

nan_tailo: I piān-nā tsia̍h gû-ling tō làu-sái.
zh_xc: 他只要喝牛奶就拉肚子。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He gets diarrhea whenever he drinks milk.

nan_sentence: 照咱的例，囡仔佇五月節的時愛挂香芳。
nan_tailo: Tsiàu lán ê lē, gín-á tī gōo-gue̍h-tseh ê sî ài kuì hiunn-phang.
zh_xc: 依照我們的習俗，小孩子在端午節時要戴香包。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: According to our custom, children should wear sachets during the Dragon Boat Festival.

zh_xc: 住在山中就靠山謀生，住在海邊就靠海謀生。俗語，地方的產業及居民的謀生方式一定受到自然地理環境的影響。或指就地取用資源。引申或指當官吏要求收受賄賂時，向受壓榨者所說的話。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Living in the mountains, one relies on the mountains for a living; living by the sea, one relies on the sea for a living. This proverb means that local industries and residents' livelihoods are certainly affected by the natural geographical environment, or it refers to the use of local resources. It can also be extended to mean what is said to those who are oppressed when officials demand bribes.

nan_sentence: 家己的工課拖甲欲袂赴矣才欲哭賴人是袂使得喔！
nan_tailo: Ka-kī ê khang-khuè thua kah beh bē-hù--ah tsiah beh khàu-luā--lâng sī bē-sái--tit oh!
zh_xc: 自己的工作拖到快來不及了才要哭著賴給別人是不行的唷！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: It's not okay to cry and blame others when your own work is almost overdue!

nan_sentence: 我會當有今仔日的成就，著愛感謝當初時恩情人的牽成。
nan_tailo: Guá ē-tàng ū kin-á-ji̍t ê sîng-tsiū, tio̍h-ài kám-siā tong-tshe-sî un-tsîng-lâng ê khan-sîng.
zh_xc: 我能有今天的成就，得要感謝當初恩人的提拔。

nan_tailo: Guá khì Tâi-lâm, lóng ē khì bé hê-kńg lâi tsia̍h.
zh_xc: 我到臺南，都會去買蝦捲來吃。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Whenever I go to Tainan, I always buy shrimp rolls to eat.

nan_sentence: 蝦蛄頭食起來無較輸龍蝦。
zh_xc: 毛緣扇蝦吃起來不遜於龍蝦。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The taste of hairy edge shrimp is not inferior to lobster.

nan_sentence: 囡仔少歲較袂曉，請你諒情。
nan_tailo: Gín-á tsió-huè khah bē-hiáu, tshiánn lí liōng-tsîng.
zh_xc: 孩子年紀小比較不懂事，請你多擔待。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The child is young and doesn't understand much, please be patient with him/her.
Actually, there's no such thing.

nan_sentence: 論真來講，你嘛有毋著，著共伊會失禮。
nan_tailo: Lūn-tsin lâi kóng, lí mā ū m̄-tio̍h, tio̍h kā i huē sit-lé.
zh_xc: 說真的，你也有錯，得跟他道歉。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: To be honest, you are also at fault, you have to apologize to him.

nan_sentence: 趁閬雨縫，我欲先來去矣。
nan_tailo: Thàn làng hōo-phāng, guá beh sing lâi-khì--ah.
zh_xc: 趁著雨歇，我要先離開了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Taking advantage of the break in the rain, I'm going to leave first.

nan_sentence: 便若拄著戰爭，有錢人攏先閬港。
nan_tailo: Piān-nā tú-tio̍h tsiàn-tsing, ū-tsînn-lâng lóng sing làng-káng.
zh_xc: 只要碰到戰爭，有錢人都先設法逃到外地去。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Whenever there is a war, the wealthy always find a way to escape to other places first.

nan_sentence: 我叫阮囝共我鬥顧擔，伊煞閬港去佮人撞球。
nan_tailo: Guá kiò guán kiánn kā guá tàu kòo-tànn, i suah làng-káng khì kah lâng tōng-kiû.
zh_xc: 我叫我兒子幫我顧攤子，他竟開溜去跟人家打撞球。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I asked my son to watch the stall for me, but he actually sneaked off to play pool with others.

nan_sentence: 果子若靠傷，就賣較無價。
nan_tailo: Kué-tsí nā khò-siong, tō bē khah bô-kè.
zh_xc: 水果要是碰傷了，就賣不到好價錢。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If the fruit is damaged, it won't sell for a good price.

nan_tailo: Kha khò-siong, kiânn tio̍h ē thiànn.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: My foot is injured, it hurts when I walk.

nan_sentence: 蔥仔著愛駐水才會較鮮脆。
nan_tailo: Tshang-á tio̍h-ài tū-tsuí tsiah ē khah tshinn-tshè.
zh_xc: 青蔥要稍微浸一下水才會比較鮮脆。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The scallions will be more crisp if they are slightly soaked in water.
He died from drowning.

nan_sentence: 溝仔窒牢咧，較加嘛會駐水。
nan_tailo: Kau-á that-tiâu--leh, khah-ke mā ē tū-tsuí.
zh_xc: 水溝塞住了，難怪會積水。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The drain is blocked, no wonder there's water accumulating.

nan_sentence: 逐家相招來弄獅，大鑼大鼓鬧猜猜。
nan_tailo: Ta̍k-ke sio-tsio lâi lāng-sai, tuā-lô tuā-kóo nāu-tshai-tshai.
zh_xc: 大家相約來舞獅，大鑼大鼓鬧哄哄。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Everyone is invited to the lion dance, with loud gongs and drums creating a lively atmosphere.

nan_sentence: 傳統嫁娶愛點燈結綵，親情朋友來祝賀，規廳堂鬧猜猜。
nan_tailo: Thuân-thóng kè-tshuā ài tiám-ting kat-tshái, tshin-tsiânn pîng-iú lâi tsiok-hō, kui thiann-tn̂g nāu-tshai-tshai.
zh_xc: 傳統婚嫁得要張燈結綵，親朋好友來祝賀，整個廳堂熱鬧哄哄。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A traditional wedding requires lanterns and decorations, with relatives and friends coming to congratulate. The whole hall is bustling with excitement.

nan_tailo: Pàng hit tsióng im-ga̍k tsin tshò-hīnn.
zh_xc: 放那種音樂聽了很受不了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Listening to that kind of music is unbearable.

nan_sentence: 三噸半的貨車扣除車身重量，會使載大約一千五百公斤的貨。
nan_tailo: Sann tòng puànn ê huè-tshia khàu-tû tshia-sin tāng-liōng, ē-sái tsài tāi-iok tsi̍t-tshing gōo-pah kong-kin ê huè.
zh_xc: 三噸半的貨車扣除車身重量，可以載運大約一千五百公斤的貨。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A three-and-a-half ton truck, deducting the weight of the truck body, can carry about 1500 kilograms of goods.

nan_tailo: Khuànn-kìnn tshiū-m̂, tō ē tsí tshuì-ta.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Seeing bayberries will quench your thirst.

nan_sentence: 激骨話刁工共話意藏佇話裡，予聽的人去掠話骨。
nan_tailo: Kik-kut-uē thiau-kang kā uē-ì tshàng tī uē--lí, hōo thiann ê lâng khì lia̍h uē-kut.
zh_xc: 歇後語故意把話意藏在話裡，讓聽的人去抓話裡的重點。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Riddles deliberately hide meanings in words, letting the listener catch the key points in the conversation.

nan_tailo: Lâng tsi̍t-ē sue, hiânn-tsuí iā ta ue.
zh_xc: 人一倒楣，連燒開水也燒焦了鍋子。俗語，比喻人一倒楣，凡事不順。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: When a person is unlucky, even boiling water can scorch the pot. This is a proverb, metaphorically meaning that when a person is unlucky, everything goes wrong.

nan_sentence: 除了竹仔佮七里香以外，燈仔花嘛是上捷種來做籬笆的樹仔。
nan_tailo: Tû-liáu tik-á kah tshit-lí-hiong í-guā, ting-á-hue mā si siōng-tsia̍p tsìng-lâi tsò lî-pa ê tshiū-á.
zh_xc: 除了竹子和七里香以外，朱槿也是最常種植來當圍籬的樹木。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: In addition to bamboo and osmanthus, hibiscus is also one of the most commonly planted trees for hedges.

nan_sentence: 伊發燒，頭殼摸著燒烘烘。
nan_tailo: I huat-sio, thâu-khak bong tio̍h sio-hōng-hōng.
zh_xc: 他發燒，額頭摸起來溫度很高。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has a fever, his forehead feels very hot when touched.

nan_sentence: 包仔拄炊好的，猶燒唿唿。
zh_xc: 包子剛蒸好的，還熱呼呼的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The steamed buns just finished steaming, they're still piping hot.

nan_sentence: 浸溫泉起來，規身軀燒唿唿。
zh_xc: 泡溫泉起來，整個人熱呼呼的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Soaking in the hot spring, the whole body feels warmly comfortable.

nan_sentence: 立冬燖補，共序大人侹身體。
nan_tailo: Li̍p-tang tīm-póo, kā sī-tuā-lâng thiānn sin-thé.
zh_xc: 立冬燉補，給父母補身子。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Stew and nourish in the start of winter, to replenish the health of parents.

nan_sentence: 這馬真少用磚仔起厝，磚仔窯一間仔一間攏關起來矣。
nan_tailo: Tsit-má tsin tsió īng tsng-á khí-tshù, tsng-á-iô tsi̍t-king-á tsi̍t-king lóng kuainn--khí-lâi--ah.
zh_xc: 現在很少用磚頭蓋房子， 磚窯一間間都關閉了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Nowadays, bricks are rarely used to build houses, and brick kilns are being shut down one after another.

nan_tailo: Thn̂g-á tsia̍h siunn tsē ē tsiù-khí.
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Eating too much candy will cause cavities.

nan_sentence: 一个起酒痟的烏白拍人，予人縛跤縛手，袂振袂動。
nan_tailo: Tsi̍t ê khí tsiú-siáu--ê oo-pe̍h phah--lâng, hōo lâng pa̍k-kha-pa̍k-tshiú, bē-tín-bē-tāng.
zh_xc: 一個發酒瘋的隨便打人，被人家綁手綁腳，不能動彈。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A drunkard who randomly hits people is tied up hand and foot by others, unable to move.

nan_sentence: 這个贊助廠商有私心，共導演縛跤縛手，害伊袂當照理想去拍片。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê tsàn-tsōo tshiúnn-siong ū su-sim, kā tō-ián pa̍k-kha-pa̍k-tshiú, hāi i bē-tàng tsiàu lí-sióng khì phah-phìnn.
zh_xc: 這家贊助廠商有私心，處處限制導演，害他無法按照理想去拍片。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This sponsor has ulterior motives, constantly restricting the director, preventing him from filming according to his ideals.

nan_sentence: 連參詳一下都無通，閣欲講東講西，你實在真聬儱。
nan_tailo: Liân tsham-siông--tsi̍t-ē to bô thang, koh beh kóng-tang-kóng-sai, lí si̍t-tsāi tsin áng-láng.
zh_xc: 連商量一下都不行，還要東扯西扯，你實在很難相處。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Even discussing things is impossible, always going off on tangents, you're really hard to get along with.

nan_sentence: 伊較講都講袂翻捙，有夠聬儱。
nan_tailo: I khah kóng to kóng bē-huan-tshia, ū-kàu áng-láng.
zh_xc: 再怎麼說也無法改變他的想法，實在非常愚鈍又頑固。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: No matter what you say, you can't change his mind. He is incredibly stubborn and foolish.

nan_sentence: 交秋的時粉鳥就會褪毛。
nan_tailo: Kau-tshiu ê sî hún-tsiáu tō ē thǹg-mn̂g.
zh_xc: 夏秋之交，鴿子就會褪換新的羽毛。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: At the turn of summer and autumn, pigeons will molt and grow new feathers.

nan_sentence: 古早人講：「姑表相伨，親疊親。」這馬袂使矣。
nan_tailo: Kóo-tsá-lâng kóng, "Koo-piáu sio-thīn, tshin-tha̍h-tshin." Tsit-má  bē-sái--ah.
zh_xc: 古人說：「姑表聯姻，親上加親。」現在不行了。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The ancients said: "Marrying within the family makes relatives even closer." But it's not acceptable now.

nan_sentence: 救蟲，賴賴趖；救人，無功勞。
nan_tailo: Kiù thâng luā-luā-sô; kiù lâng, bô kong-lô.
zh_xc: 救蟲，蟲還會活潑蠕動，像在表示感謝；救人，卻一點功勞也沒有。俗語，慨嘆人心險惡，忘恩負義，比蟲還不如。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Save an insect, and the insect will still wriggle lively, as if expressing gratitude; save a person, yet there is no merit at all. This proverb laments the wickedness of human heart, the ingratitude, and the betrayal, which are even worse than insects.

nan_sentence: 伊予人𤆬歹去，不時走學，佇外口賴賴趖。
nan_tailo: I hōo lâng tshuā-pháinn--khì, put-sî tsáu-o̍h, tī guā-kháu luā-luā-sô.
zh_xc: 他被人帶壞了，時常逃學，在外面四處閒晃。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He was led astray, often skipping school and wandering around outside.

nan_sentence: 伊定定去杉仔行抔鋸屑烌轉來燃。
nan_tailo: I tiānn-tiānn khì sam-á-hâng put kì-sut-hu tńg-lâi hiânn.
zh_xc: 他常常去木材行撿拾鋸木屑回來當柴火。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He often goes to the timber yard to pick up sawdust to use as firewood.

nan_tailo: Khah sǹg, iā sī tshun tsi̍t tiâu tsînn-kǹg.
zh_xc: 算來算去，也只是剩下一條錢串子，意謂終歸一無所有。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: After all the calculations, all that's left is a string of coins, implying that in the end, there's nothing left.

zh_xc: 腦袋尖尖的，有錢就鑽，活像一條錢串子。俗語，嘲笑熱衷金錢的人
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Sharp-headed, drilling when there's money, looks like a string of coins. A proverb, mocking those who are passionate about money.

nan_sentence: 無你是錢貫喔？一仙五厘都袂出得！
nan_tailo: Bô lí sī tsînn-kǹg--ooh? Tsi̍t-sián-gōo-lî to bē tshut--tit!
zh_xc: 你難不成是條錢串子嗎？一毛錢都不肯出！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Are you a money stringer? You don't even want to spend a dime!

nan_sentence: 見若拜六，伊就走去踮沬。
nan_tailo: Kiàn-nā pài-la̍k, i tō tsáu khì tiàm-bī.
zh_xc: 只要是禮拜六，他就跑去潛水。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: As long as it's Saturday, he goes diving.

nan_tailo: Khì tshân--lí to̍h tshài tńg-lâi tsú.
zh_xc: 到田裡去採拾野菜回來煮。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Go to the field to pick wild vegetables and come back to cook.

nan_tailo: Tsú tshài tsìn-tsîng, tio̍h-ài sing to̍h tshài.
zh_xc: 煮菜前，要先剔除蔬菜中不能吃的部份。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Before cooking, you need to remove the inedible parts of the vegetables.

nan_sentence: 隔壁歕燈火，佮你無底代。
nan_tailo: Keh-piah pûn ting-hué, kah lí bô-tī-tāi.
zh_xc: 鄰居吹熄燈火，跟你無關。當有人爭論之時，第三者出言袒護一方，對方則用這句話叫他別管閒事；或指多管他人的家務事。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The neighbor blows out the lamp, it's none of your business. When people are arguing, if a third party speaks up to defend one side, the other side might use this phrase to tell them not to meddle in others' affairs; it also refers to those who interfere too much in other people's domestic matters.

nan_sentence: 厝邊咧凌治某囝，咱著通報113專線，毋通想講佮咱無底代。
nan_tailo: Tshù-pinn teh lîng-tī bóo-kiánn, lán tio̍h thong-pò it-it-sam tsuan-suànn, m̄-thang siūnn-kóng kah lán bô-tī-tāi.
zh_xc: 鄰居在凌虐妻兒，咱們得通報113專線，不要以為不關咱們的事。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The neighbor is abusing his wife and children, we must report to the 113 hotline, don't think it's none of our business.

nan_sentence: 你有夠大目孔，兩个人食飯買遮濟菜。
nan_tailo: Lí ū-kàu tuā-ba̍k-khóng, nn̄g ê lâng tsia̍h-pn̄g bé tsiah tsē tshài.
zh_xc: 你有夠貪多，才兩個人吃飯買這麼多菜。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You are quite greedy, buying so many dishes for just two people to eat.
The drizzle keeps falling without stopping.

nan_sentence: 伊是咱工會的頭兄，對外的重大事件攏央伊出頭處理。
nan_tailo: I sī lán kang-huē ê thâu-hiann, tuì guā ê tiōng-tāi sū-kiānn lóng iang i tshut-thâu tshú-lí.
zh_xc: 他是咱們工會的首腦人物，對外的重大事件都央求他出面處理。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is the head of our union, and all major external events require him to intervene and handle them.

nan_sentence: 我買一支手機仔八千，煞著開萬二箍去修理，真正是頭較大身。
nan_tailo: Guá bé tsi̍t ki tshiú-ki-á peh-tshing, suah tio̍h khai bān-jī khoo khì siu-lí, tsin-tsiànn sī thâu-khah-tuā-sin.
zh_xc: 我買一支手機八千，卻得花一萬二去修理，真的是本末倒置。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: I bought a cell phone for eight thousand, but had to spend twelve thousand to repair it, it's really putting the cart before the horse.

nan_sentence: 這件代誌予伊舞甲按呢，有影是頭較大身，歹收尾喔！
nan_tailo: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì hōo i bú kah án-ne, ū-iánn sī thâu-khah-tuā-sin, pháinn siu-bué--ooh!
zh_xc: 這件事情給他弄成這樣子，真是越理越亂，難以收拾啊！
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He's made such a mess of this situation, it's getting more and more chaotic, and it's hard to clean up!

nan_tailo: M̄ tsai lōo, koh beh gia̍h thâu-kî.
zh_xc: 不曉得前進的路線，還想要在陣頭的前方高舉旗幟當先鋒。俗語，比喻自不量力，強出頭，或指外行領導內行。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Not knowing the way forward, yet wanting to be at the forefront of the formation, holding up the flag as the vanguard. This is a proverb, metaphorically referring to overestimating one's abilities, being overly assertive, or referring to a layman leading an expert.

nan_sentence: 遮的蓮霧攏是頭篩仔，寄予行口賣，價數一定誠好。
nan_tailo: Tsia-ê lián-bū lóng sī thâu-thai-á, kià hōo hâng-kháu bē, kè-siàu it-tīng tsiânn hó.
zh_xc: 這些蓮霧都是上上之選，寄到大批發商去賣，價錢一定相當不錯。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: These wax apples are all top-notch choices, sent to sell to large wholesalers, the price must be quite good.

nan_sentence: 頷頸珠是查埔人才有的。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The Adam's apple is something only men have.

nan_sentence: 阿榮當咧轉大人，講話鴨雄仔聲。
zh_xc: 阿榮正在發育成大人，說話像小公鴨的叫聲。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Ah Rong is growing up into an adult, his voice sounds like a little drake's quack.

nan_sentence: 這个人客龜龜鱉鱉，買一種物件轉來換三逝。
nan_tailo: Tsit ê lâng-kheh ku-ku-pih-pih, bé tsi̍t tsióng mi̍h-kiānn tńg-lâi uānn sann tsuā.
zh_xc: 這個客人不乾不脆，買一個東西回來換三次。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: This customer is so indecisive, they bought one thing and exchanged it three times.

nan_sentence: 伊最近變甲龜龜鱉鱉，問伊按怎，閣吞吞吐吐，毋知咧變啥魍。
nan_tailo: I tsuè-kīn piàn kah ku-ku-pih-pih, mn̄g i án-tsuánn, koh thun-thun-thòo-thòo, m̄ tsai teh pìnn-siánn-báng.
zh_xc: 他最近變得神神祕祕的，問他怎麼了，又吞吞吐吐的，不知道在搞什麼飛機。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He has recently become secretive. When I ask him what's going on, he stammers and hesitates. I have no idea what he's up to.

nan_sentence: 近來真䆀氣，凡事著愛較細膩咧。
nan_tailo: Kīn-lâi tsin bái-khuì, huân-sū tio̍h-ài khah sè-jī--leh.
zh_xc: 最近運氣不佳，凡事得要小心謹慎一點。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Recently, luck has not been good, so be careful and cautious in everything.

nan_sentence: 下昏真䆀氣，拍麻雀一直放銃。
nan_tailo: E-hng tsin bái-khuì, phah-muâ-tshiok it-ti̍t pàng-tshìng.
zh_xc: 今晚手氣很背，打麻將一直放槍。

nan_sentence: 你若看伊做了毋著，著共伊點拄一下。

nan_sentence: 好事來，歹事煞，觀音佛祖來擺撥。

nan_sentence: 舊底阮無熟似，舊年才相捌。

nan_sentence: 伊舊底佇金仔店食頭路。

nan_sentence: 伊的舊症頭又閣夯起來矣。

nan_sentence: 警方推測這件命案可能有幕後的藏鏡人。

nan_sentence: 伊這站仔因為胃破空手術，當咧蹛院。

nan_sentence: 新的總經理真𠢕轉錢空，順利解決公司的財務危機。

nan_sentence: 雜貨仔店的生理攏去予大賣場搶去矣。

nan_sentence: 一千箍的貨刣甲賰三百，傷離經啦！

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The price of a thousand-dollar item is slashed to only three hundred dollars, it's ridiculous!

nan_sentence: 這過做風颱，真濟田園攏予大水淹去，作穡人誠離經。

nan_sentence: 毋通攑香綴拜，予人牽咧烏白踅。

nan_sentence: 暗時路燈跤癩𰣻蛾仔颺颺飛。

nan_sentence: 釘毋著所在的鐵釘仔著用鐵釘挽挽起來。

nan_tailo: King-tsio khì hōo hong-thai sàu-tó liáu-liáu, lán tio̍h khah giám-ngē--leh, tîng-lâi.

zh_xc: 腐臭的橘子還排在竹籠的上面。罵人不知醜陋還在人前自曝其短，臭美而無自知之明。或指不知恥者愛出風頭。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: The rotten orange is still on top of the bamboo basket. Insulting people without knowing their own ugliness, showing off their shortcomings in front of others, being vain and lacking self-awareness. It may also refer to those who love to show off without feeling any shame.

nan_sentence: 有話聽好講，毋通囥佇心肝內。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You can speak your mind, don't keep it in your heart.
Go wash your hands, so you can eat.

nan_sentence: 一粒好好的錶仔變弄甲害害去。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: A perfectly good watch was fiddled with until it broke.
A-Gou is better at playing tricks.

zh_xc: 年歲大了，舉止違背常情。也常指一個老人的個性、嗜好突然大變。
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: As one gets older, their behavior often goes against the norm. It also often refers to a sudden major change in an elderly person's personality or preferences.

nan_sentence: 伊鬼鬼祟祟，毋知閣欲變啥魍矣。
nan_tailo: I kuí-kuí-suī-suī, m̄ tsai koh beh pìnn-siánn-báng--ah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He is sneaky, I don't know what tricks he is going to play this time.

nan_tailo: I nā bô tsînn tō pìnn-bô-báng--ah!

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: If he has no money, he can't make any tricks!

nan_sentence: 現代人買物件的時，真濟人是用鑢卡的。
nan_tailo: Hiān-tāi-lâng bé mi̍h-kiānn ê sî, tsin tsē lâng sī īng lù-khah--ê.

nan_sentence: 彼領衫殕殕，這領較豔色。

nan_tailo: Ing-á-ba̍k, khuànn kuè sann tîng piah.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: As sharp as an eagle's eye, able to see through three walls. It refers to a person with great judgment.

nan_sentence: 鹽桑仔大出的時，挽袂赴，落甲規塗跤。
nan_tailo: Iâm-sng-á tuā-tshut ê sî, bán bē-hù, lak kah kui thôo-kha.

nan_sentence: 鹽酸仔足臭賤的，真𠢕生湠。

nan_sentence: 你是阿榮喔！歹勢，我真戇目。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: You are Ah Rong, right! Sorry, my eyesight is very poor.

nan_sentence: 彼間餐廳，椅桌、塗跤一四界𣻸塌塌，真無衛生。

nan_sentence: 這幾日雨澹水滴，路不時攏𣻸塌塌。

nan_sentence: 下昏我有一个食飯會，無欲轉去食暗矣。

nan_sentence: 阮阿媽雖然毋捌字，毋過伊講出喙的話攏是金言玉語。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Although my grandmother is illiterate, the words she speaks are all golden words of wisdom.

nan_sentence: 伊共我害甲悽慘落魄，我也袂當予伊好食睏。
nan_tailo: (I kā guá hāi kah tshi-tshám-lo̍k-phik, guá iā bē-tàng hōo i  hó-tsia̍h-khùn.

nan_sentence: 兄弟仔大漢著愛隨人食矣。

nan_sentence: 逐年寒人攏有真濟渡鳥來臺灣過冬。

nan_sentence: 向望今年風調雨順，予咱逐家大趁錢。
nan_tailo: Ǹg-bāng kin-nî hong-tiâu-ú-sūn, hōo lán ta̍k-ke tuā-thàn-tsînn.

nan_sentence: 公司一堆狗肉數，按怎掠都掠袂直。

The boss drives an empty car to pick up goods.

nan_sentence: 計程車司機足無愛落空車。
nan_tailo: Kè-thîng-tshia su-ki tsiok bô ài làu-khang-tshia.

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Taxi drivers really dislike driving around without any passengers.

nan_sentence: 臺灣人予人召去南洋戰場做肉餅，真濟無轉來。
nan_tailo: Tâi-uân-lâng hōo lâng tiàu-khì Lâm-iûnn tsiàn-tiûnn tsò-bah-piánn, tsin tsē bô tńg--lâi.

nan_tailo: Bô tāi-tsì thang tsò, tian-tò bô-kio̍k.

nan_tailo: Hit tshut hì puann kah tsin bô-kio̍k.

nan_sentence: 開十萬箍買這軀衫實在真無局。
nan_tailo: Khai tsa̍p-bān khoo bé tsit su sann si̍t-tsāi tsin bô-kio̍k.

nan_sentence: 虹誠媠，毋過一時仔就無去矣。
nan_tailo: Khīng tsiânn suí, m̄-koh tsi̍t-sî-á tō bô--khì--ah.

nan_sentence: 你先入去餐廳，我來去停車。
nan_tailo: Lí sing ji̍p-khì tshan-thiann, guá lâi-khì thîng-tshia.

nan_sentence: 這改風颱，害阿伯的田園予大水流去矣。

Flood occurred

nan_sentence: 阮大的對細漢的真照顧。

nan_sentence: 伊真為家己人，所以遐的細的攏足敬重伊。

english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: He strongly protects his own people, so those younger brothers greatly respect him.

nan_sentence: 阮兜較早佇咧山內種果子。

nan_sentence: 你直接提去予伊毋就好矣，哪著閣用寄的？

nan_sentence: 以早遮是田，這馬做停車場，聽講以後欲起厝。

nan_sentence: 欲答應毋答應是出在你的意思，我袂共你干涉。

zh_xc: 以眼神示意，常用於表示眉目傳情
english_via_gpt4_zh_translation: Indicate with eyes, often used to express romantic feelings through eye contact.

People who are born with good fortune

nan_tailo: Senn ū sî, sí ū ji̍t.

nan_sentence: 遮咧欠跤手，伊拄拄有閒，就請伊來鬥相共。

nan_sentence: 𪜶某真早就過身，賰爸仔囝兩人做伙過日子。

nan_sentence: 腹肚枵無才調做工課，愛食飽才有氣力。

nan_sentence: 伊規工攏佇厝裡無出去。

nan_sentence: 阿母想欲飼一隻狗仔佮伊做伴。

nan_sentence: 你偷偷仔共物件提入去，毋通予人看著。

nan_sentence: 伊這改是堅心欲拍拚，無成功就毋轉去故鄉。

nan_sentence: 伊的能力是通人知、通人呵咾的。

nan_sentence: 我想講已經暗矣，歹勢共你攪吵。

nan_sentence: 我才想講欲去揣你，你就敲電話來矣。
